description:
Customer Reliability Engineering is what you get when you treat operations and data as if it's a software problem. Our mission is to architect, build, secure and provide for the software and systems behind all of our customer's services, with an ever-watchful eye on their availability, latency, performance, and capacity.
This is an unusual job, unlike others in the industry. Like traditional operations groups, we design, build and help to keep important, revenue-critical systems up and running despite downtimes, traffic outages, and configuration problems.
Unlike traditional operations groups, we often have an ability and authority to fix, extend, and scale the code to keep it working and harden it against all the vagaries of the internet. We hire people from both systems and software backgrounds. Strong candidates will have experience with both.
As an Customer Reliability Engineer on our team, you will have the opportunity to tackle the complex problems of scale which are sometimes unique to our customers while using your expertise in resolving problems, coding, algorithms, complexity analysis and large-scale system design.
This is a hands-on technical expert role with a high potential for learning new things and creating new experiences. If you are a positive-thinking, versatile technical leader who has that kind of i-want-to-know-everything drive, and you thrive in a fast-paced, startup-like environment, we want you on-board with our all-star winning team.
CRE's culture of diversity, intellectual curiosity, problem solving and openness is key to its success. Our organization brings together people with a wide variety of backgrounds, experiences and perspectives. We encourage them to collaborate, think big and take risks in a blame-free environment. We promote self-direction to work on meaningful projects, while we also strive to create an environment that provides the support and mentorship needed to learn and grow.
Requirements:
BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field involving systems engineering (e.g., physics or mathematics), or equivalent practical experience.
Experience in one or more of the following: C, C++, Java, Python, Go, Perl, Ruby or shell scripting.
Experience with Unix/Linux operating systems internals and administration (e.g., filesystems, inodes, system calls) or networking (e.g., TCP/IP, routing, network topologies and hardware, SDN).
Expertise in designing, analyzing and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems.
Systematic problem-solving approach, coupled with strong communication skills and a sense of ownership and drive.
Ability to debug and optimize code and automate routine tasks.

meta1:
Lead Front End Engineer (CoDeFi)
Consensys - Paris (75)
date_publication:
il y a 30+ jours
- Continuer pour postuler
Signaler cette offre d'emploi
description:
ConsenSys is the world's largest pure-play provider of enterprise blockchain software, created in 2014 by Joseph Lubin a co-founder of Ethereum. At ConsenSys, we build infrastructure software that make connection to and leveraging blockchain technologies straightforward for businesses. We assist large corporations in the integration & customization of our infrastructure by deploying full stack engineering team that operates respecting most effective agile methodologies. Lastly, we make strategic investments in blockchain technology startups.

-------------
About CoFi OS
-------------

CoFi OS is a technology stack developed by ConsenSys, partly open sourced, and compatible with all projects related to financial assets. CoFi OS enables the issuance, management and transfer of "tokenized" financial assets in a completely secure way, and in compliance with regulations in an automated manner.

CoFi OS was designed to be compliant with financial market requirements, including the European market. It proves to be a particularly relevant technology for the "tokenization" of non-listed shares, specifically the shares of Venture Capital funds, Private Equity funds, or the shares of real estate investment companies.

The "tokenization" of financial assets delivers important benefits for investors and issuers:

Operational efficiency: simplification and reduction of costs related to the issuance, management and transfer of assets.
Market expansion: broaden potential investor base through a simpler acquisition process and lower minimum entry tickets.
Additional features: opening/simplification of a secondary market, and easier transmission of information between issuers and investors.
Interoperability is a major challenge in the context of "tokenization," as only a solution for issuing generic financial assets that is compatible with a maximum number of blockchain platforms can facilitate adoption.

The interoperability of CoFi OS is based on:
An open-source standard specifically designed for financial assets (ERC1400), shared and reviewed by the Ethereum community, and backward compatible with the most widely used standard (ERC20).
Combination of Ethereum private networks (to meet the challenges of scalability, privacy, and finality of transactions) and the public network (for interoperability) with the ability to transfer securities from one network to another in a secure manner.
Using Ethereum blockchain technology, that today has the largest developer community in the world (+400K).
--------------
About the role
--------------

As Lead Front End Engineer at ConsenSys you will be joining a world reference technical team with State of the Art expertise in developing & delivering advanced decentralized applications (Ðapps). Your job will be first to lead developments of our Front End solutions including architecture design and implementation. Second to ensure the best possible evolution of our Front-End stack by integrating new relevant libraries, defining best development practices as well as efficiently sharing knowledge within the team.

----------------
Job requirements
----------------

Required
--------

3+ years experience programming with JavaScript and its ecosystem (ES6, babel, npm, yarn, webpack...)
3+ years experience implementing Single-Page Applications with React/Redux or similar Front End frameworks
Familiarity with automated CI/CD environment
Experience working in agile environment using tools such as Jira, Asana, GitLab board, Kanban...
Bonus points for
----------------

Understanding Blockchain technology, especially Ethereum
Experience developing ÐApps using the Ethereum Web3.js API
Contribution to Open-Source projects
Experience using GraphQL with Apollo or Relay
Experience developing user interfaces using Material Design
Other skills to demonstrate
---------------------------

Excellent verbal and written communication in French and English
Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication and organisation
Willingness to constantly learn & improve, challenging yourself to stay at the top of your game
-------------------
Why join ConsenSys?
-------------------

Here are some of the perks of being part of a unique organization like ConsenSys
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The forefront of a revolution. At ConsenSys we fundamentally believe that a next generation of technologies presents the opportunity to create a more just and equitable society. We believe that there is an opportunity to bring the remaining 2 billion unbanked people into the global economy and to radically transform our society for the enrichment of humankind
A dynamic startup environment. ConsenSys is a thought leader in the blockchain space and we are absorbing a significant portion of the mindshare. This is both exciting and challenging, as we learn to scale our organization while adhering to the principles of decentralization
Deep technical challenges. This entire ecosystem is less than 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler. There is much to be done before these platforms can scale to the order of millions or billions of users. ConsenSys is building the technology platforms that can get us to those next thresholds of scale
Continuous learning and improvements. You'll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas and frameworks from your peers and as you work on different projects -- challenging you to stay at the top of your game
ConsenSys was named a Top 100 FinTech company by KPMG's 2016 Fintech Innovators report ( https://h2.vc/reports/fintechinnovators/company/2016/ConsenSys )
A few important things to know
------------------------------

Some travel could be required. Projects may be on client sites, so our team members need to be flexible and up for travel. We do our best to take people's personal situations into account, but we know it's not for everyone
To apply for a role at our Paris office, you need to live in Paris and speak French fluently. If you do not meet these criteria, we are certainly able to find another role for you at ConsenSys

Operational efficiency: simplification and reduction of costs related to the issuance, management and transfer of assets.
Market expansion: broaden potential investor base through a simpler acquisition process and lower minimum entry tickets.
Additional features: opening/simplification of a secondary market, and easier transmission of information between issuers and investors. Interoperability is a major challenge in the context of "tokenization," as only a solution for issuing generic financial assets that is compatible with a maximum number of blockchain platforms can facilitate adoption.
The interoperability of CoFi OS is based on:
An open-source standard specifically designed for financial assets (ERC1400), shared and reviewed by the Ethereum community, and backward compatible with the most widely used standard (ERC20).
Combination of Ethereum private networks (to meet the challenges of scalability, privacy, and finality of transactions) and the public network (for interoperability) with the ability to transfer securities from one network to another in a secure manner.
Using Ethereum blockchain technology, that today has the largest developer community in the world (+400K).
About the role

ConsenSys is looking for a QA Engineer to own the Digital Asset and DeFi efforts.

As QA Engineer, you will be responsible for

Create and maintain detailed automated and manual test cases
Oversee and manage multiple projects at a time
Estimate, prioritize and plan testing activities
Review requirements and provide knowledgeable feedback to ensure they are thorough and detailed
Keep thorough documentation of all aspects of a project, including but not limited to:
Deployment communication
Detailed bug tickets
Comprehensive manual and automated test cases
Actively participate in project development meetings such as backlog grooming and sprint planning
Build a team to successfully ensure all major software releases meet a high quality standard
Job requirements
Required

Experience working with automation framework tools such as Selenium, WebDriverIO, Cucumber
Experience working with containerized applications and AWS CI/CD Offerings
Good understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle
Excellent communication skills
Outstanding prioritization and time management skills
Other skills to demonstrate

Excellent verbal and written communication in French and English
Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication and organisation
Willingness to constantly learn & improve, challenging yourself to stay at the top of your game
Why join ConsenSys?
Here are some of the perks of being part of a unique organization like ConsenSys

The forefront of a revolution. At ConsenSys we fundamentally believe that a next generation of technologies presents the opportunity to create a more just and equitable society. We believe that there is an opportunity to bring the remaining 2 billion unbanked people into the global economy and to radically transform our society for the enrichment of humankind
A dynamic startup environment. ConsenSys is a thought leader in the blockchain space and we are absorbing a significant portion of the mindshare. This is both exciting and challenging, as we learn to scale our organization while adhering to the principles of decentralization
Deep technical challenges. This entire ecosystem is less than 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler. There is much to be done before these platforms can scale to the order of millions or billions of users. ConsenSys is building the technology platforms that can get us to those next thresholds of scale
Continuous learning and improvements. You'll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas and frameworks from your peers and as you work on different projects -- challenging you to stay at the top of your game
ConsenSys was named a Top 100 FinTech company by KPMG's 2016 Fintech Innovators report
A few important things to know

Some travel could be required. Projects may be on client sites, so our team members need to be flexible and up for travel. We do our best to take people's personal situations into account, but we know it's not for everyone
To apply for a role at our Paris office, you need to live in Paris and speak French fluently. If you do not meet these criteria, we are certainly able to find another role for you at ConsenSys

Principal Project Manager also ensures adherence to project management methodology practices, provides project manager mentoring, performs Project Management Reviews and reinforces the enterprise knowledge management through the communication of lessons learned and best practices development.

description:
Why work for VMware PSO?
The global VMware Professional Services Organization (PSO) drives the adoption of VMware technology and solutions. The Global Account Management (GAM) team owns the business across top enterprise accounts with global operations. We are responsible for driving a significant part of VMWare’s revenue by co-innovating with our customers and partners. Our vision is to lead the digital transformation journey by driving the simplification and acceleration of IT solutions using VMware leading-edge technology and deliver the business outcomes our customers demand.
We are passionate about our Customers: our focus is on professional excellence and quality. We have a rich portfolio of consulting services aimed at bringing to bear the experience, expertise and methodology of our delivery teams around software defined Data Centre (SDDC), cloud automation, multi-cloud, IoT and workspace management.
We are committed to offering a collaborative and supportive working environment with an opportunity to develop in services sales. We promote an inclusive atmosphere where your voice will be heard, and where you will join a fun, dynamic team working in partnership with each other.
The Role:
As a Senior Client Solutions Architect (CSA), Global Accounts you will be responsible for developing solutions for large services engagements across large enterprise accounts in France. You will be part of an exciting team working to drive complex solutions that create disruption, help our customers to innovate their business models and enable them to achieve competitive advantage and differentiation through using VMware’s technologies and services.
Your team is formed by a group of top talent sales individuals across EMEA and with a strong background and experience in selling professional and consulting services for cloud infrastructure, software, workspace mobility, end user computing and IT operational transformation. We are looking for services solutions architects with experience in Telco to share their knowledge and approach in a diverse sales team.
You will be working with the extended EMEA GAM team and leading the services technical presales activities with a variety of VMware presales resources to build a technical proposition to your customers and achieve your business objectives by selling large (+$1-5M) and complex projects.
This is a role which requires passion, dedication and creativity. The GAM team is driving innovation at VMware.
Responsibilities:
You will be responsible for:
The professional services solutions for France Global Accounts in EMEA

Leading the solution architecture

Build new solutions for our customers by taking advantage of the VMware new technologies (such as IoT, multi-cloud, NFV)

Required Experience & Skills
Many years of experience in a consulting / services solution architect position

Deep Understanding of Software Defined Data Centres & cloud infrastructures and common challenges:

Virtualization (Design of Storage, Compute and Network)

A solid understanding of the detail behind the solutions and have the capability to communicate these at a high-level vision.
Many years of experience in infrastructure architecture and design of complex distributed systems environments, including failover techniques, recovery/rollback, and application partitioning
A strong presentation, executive client management and business development skills as well as superior organisational and observance skills.

Self-motivated, passionate, dedicated, driven, tenacious, achiever and well presented

Good understanding of our portfolio

We are redesigning the future of digital at Hilti and are looking for new team members to play an integral part in our transformation journey. As a Product Owner, you will work in a global, multicultural, collaborative, fun, and agile work environment. You will work with the business stakeholders and your development team to envision the product strategy, you prioritize the backlog and take responsibility of the commercial success of your product.
Who is Hilti?
If you’re new to the industry, you might not have heard of us. We provide leading-edge tools, technologies, software and services for the global construction sector. We have a proud heritage, built over 75 years, and a worldwide reputation for pioneering products and exceptional service. With 29,000 people in more than 120 countries we operate with a unique direct sales model and generate around 250,000 customer interactions every day.
What does the role involve?
As a Data Science Agile Product Owner, you will be empowered to create personalized data products and features that improve our customers’ experience by using our data, with a strong focus on driving conversion and customer loyalty. You envision the product strategy by creating value for the customer and the company. You will lead a team of data scientists and data engineers to constantly develop new user stories, find and test improvements with high business impact. You work closely, motivate and lead your team. You decide with the business stakeholders, the local process experts, the global process managers and other parts of the organization the product features with the help your team by defining the scope, creating the agile stories, prioritize the backlog.
The Digital Marketing team, located in Boulogne-Billancourt, France, consists of 150+ team members with the newest technologies to create a unique user experience for Hilti’s extraordinary products and services.
What do we offer?
To further accelerate in digital marketing, we are building our Global Digital Hub in Paris. You will experience the agile mentality of a start-up, combining the stability of a sound business model and the working environment of an award-winning culture. You can make an impact from day one in an international and diverse team by shaping the future of digital at Hilti and revolutionize customer interactions.
Why should you apply?
We’re investing more than ever in our digital transformation. As a company whose lifeblood is innovation, we give our customers the next level of digital offerings on an impressive global scale! For you, it means unrivalled opportunities to work in a ‘start-up within’ environment, develop an international career and really have an impact on the shape of things to come.

Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or a related field and Master of Business Administration (preferred)
Two or more years of experience as a Product Owner in an Agile Software Development setting
Substantial experience in a data science related discipline, preferably recommendation engines or other personalization methods
Strong ability to connect with global partners to build bonds, inspire, influence, and accomplish goals
Effectively communicate complicated concepts to a non-technical and technical audience in English (verbal and written)
Entrepreneurial, can-do attitude with a strong sense of product quality
Proactive, flexible and adaptable
During your interviews, you will meet several members of the digital team including leadership. This way you get to know more about us, and we get to know more about you.
Tempted to apply? Click “apply now” and send us your resume today!
Do you want to know more? Go to https://careers.hilti.com/en/digital-marketing
Join us and #TransformDigital

description:
DESCRIPTION
Work is about doing something that matters and growing as we do it. That's why we've built HR software that can help make this happen. At Talentsoft our mission is to help everyone, from our people to our customers, experience work differently.

Each of our 600 Talentsoftees comes to work with an entrepreneurial spirit and the flexibility to try new things, work with innovative technologies, and build corporate-social responsibility directly into their jobs. The result is that we have 9 million people in 130 countries using our products, strong brand recognition in a fiercely competitive industry, and employees who work differently and love their jobs because of it.

If you'd love to love your job check out the description below, apply today, and discover how you can work differently too.
JOB
Talentsoft développe une solution web de gestion des Talents : notre outil est une suite de modules en mode SaaS qui assiste les équipes Ressources Humaines dans la gestion du recrutement, de la formation et de la gestion des carrières. Notre solution permet à 10 millions d’utilisateurs d’avoir un impact sur leur trajectoire professionnelle : avec Talentsoft, demander une mobilité, candidater sur un poste ouvert, se former en ligne ou bien piloter les rémunérations de son équipe se fait en quelques clics.

Pour concevoir, développer et faire évoluer cette solution, 200 ingénieurs travaillent chez Talentsoft ; chaque jour, ils améliorent les modules existants, et enrichissent la solution en développant les fonctionnalités qui permettront aux clients de mieux gérer leurs processus RH.

Les équipes techniques sont principalement composées de Développeurs qui développent en C#, .NET, ASP.NET. Certains sont passionnés par l’algorithmie, d’autres se forment petit à petit aux technologies Frontend.

Actuellement, nous remplaçons des pans entiers de l’application par des composants ReactJS (démarche DesignSystem). Nous utilisons SQL Server pour les bases de données et la solution est hébergée sur Azure. Les squads fonctionnent toutes en Agile (SCRUM ou Kanban), et on essaye tous d’appliquer les principes DevOps pour délivrer en continu.

Une journée-type dans la vie d’un Développeur chez Talentsoft :

De bon matin, tu participes au Stand-Up Meeting,
Avec ta squad, vous vous fixez des objectifs réalistes pour la journée,
Au cours de la journée, tu passes du temps sur ton clavier : tu développes de nouvelles features, tu améliores une fonctionnalité existante ou bien tu refactores du code. Tu travailles en solo, ou bien avec ton « Peer »,
Quand tu n’es pas sur ton clavier, alors tu échanges avec les membres de ta squad : un Product Owner, mais aussi un UX Designer, un Architecte et un Quality Engineer. Ensemble vous trouvez de nouvelles façons d’avancer dans la même direction,
Jour après jour, tu échanges avec les membres de ta guilde, qui travaillent sur d’autres parties de l’application, dans d’autres squads. Ainsi, tu apprends de nouvelles choses, chaque jour.
PROFILE

Quelques exemples de projets en cours :
Nous remplaçons une partie de notre applicatif par des composants ReactJS, et nous modernisons la stack en remplaçant les Webforms par des technologies plus modernes,
Nous enrichissons notre SDK afin que des éditeurs tiers puissent créer des widgets directement à l’intérieur de notre applicatif, et nous créons une plateforme PaaS,
Nous développons notre nouveau CoreHR, le cœur de l’application regroupant toutes les données administratives des collaborateurs,
Nous développons un module d’évaluation en continue des collaborateurs qui ressemble beaucoup à un board Trello,
Nous développons notre première appli mobile (Android et iOS) pour rendre les Systèmes d’Information RH plus accessibles à tous les utilisateurs,
En somme, chez Talentsoft, nous enrichissons chaque jour notre produit, et nous travaillons régulièrement sur de nouveaux projets qui viennent enrichir l’applicatif existant – le tout, dans une démarche DevOps / CI, en automatisant le plus possible les tests et les phases de release.

Ce qu’il te faut pour réussir dans ce poste :
Tu as au moins 10 ans d'expérience en développement web ;
Si tu maîtrises C# .NET, tout sera plus simple pour toi,
Chez Talentsoft, nous sommes d’éternels apprenants : on aime tester, construire, déconstruire, échouer, apprendre, recommencer, réussir.
Chez Talentsoft, on aime expérimenter. C’est ta curiosité et ta soif d’apprendre qui te permettront de te sentir bien dans ton poste, et de te trouver de nouvelles limites,
Très sincèrement, c’est tout ce qu’il te faut.

Quelques infos en plus :
Tu auras un ordinateur puissant, et 2 à 3 écrans (24 pouces),
Tu travailles dans un open space calme et propice à la concentration, entouré(e) de ta squad,
Tu bénéficies de 20% de freetime pour explorer de nouveaux projets,
Tu iras dans des confs : Devoxx, Meilleur Dev de France, Dev Fest, Api Days…
Tous les vendredis, on organise un meetup interne avec des pizza pour présenter un sujet tech (nouvelle techno, nouvel outil…),
On est favorable au télétravail (1 jour par semaine),
On a une bonne mutuelle et un bon CE, on rembourse 50% des titres de transport, 50% des tickets resto.
Si tu veux un aperçu des projets techniques que l’on met en œuvre chez Talentsoft, tu peux lire le blog des Développeurs. Si tu veux rencontrer nos équipes et travailler avec nous, envoie-nous ton CV !

PERKS
Freshly squeezed OJ Foosball Ping-pong table Rooftop terrace Electric bikes Lounge

You will be working with a group of world-class data scientists and engineers who have years of experience in information retrieval. They aim at driving product strategy with data-driven insights.
We are a team with diverse technical backgrounds who share a passion for problem-solving, new technologies, and learning. We love to learn and teach and help each other, and we are looking for people with a collaborative attitude and openness to others' ideas.

Consensys - Paris (75)

description:
About ConsenSys

ConsenSys is a venture production studio and the leading global blockchain technology firm. Our mission is to transform the emerging economic, social, and political operating systems of the planet by building and scaling applications, disruptive startups, and enterprise software products empowered by decentralized technology, specifically Ethereum. If you are someone that thrives in a fast-paced environment where being self-directed, determined, and resilient are a requirement, we would love for you to join us.

About CoFi OS

CoFi OS is a technology stack developed by ConsenSys, partly open sourced, and compatible with all projects related to financial assets. CoFi OS enables the issuance, management and transfer of "tokenized" financial assets in a completely secure way, and in compliance with regulations in an automated manner. CoFi OS was designed to be compliant with financial market requirements, including the European market. It proves to be a particularly relevant technology for the "tokenization" of non-listed shares, specifically the shares of Venture Capital funds, Private Equity funds, or the shares of real estate investment companies.

The "tokenization" of financial assets delivers important benefits for investors and issuers:

Operational efficiency: simplification and reduction of costs related to the issuance, management and transfer of assets.
Market expansion: broaden potential investor base through a simpler acquisition process and lower minimum entry tickets.
Additional features: opening/simplification of a secondary market, and easier transmission of information between issuers and investors.
Interoperability is a major challenge in the context of "tokenization," as only a solution for issuing generic financial assets that is compatible with a maximum number of blockchain platforms can facilitate adoption.

The interoperability of CoFi OS is based on:
An open-source standard specifically designed for financial assets (ERC1400), shared and reviewed by the Ethereum community, and backward compatible with the most widely used standard (ERC20).
Combination of Ethereum private networks (to meet the challenges of scalability, privacy, and finality of transactions) and the public network (for interoperability) with the ability to transfer securities from one network to another in a secure manner.
Using Ethereum blockchain technology, that today has the largest developer community in the world (+400K).
About the role

ConsenSys is looking for a UI/UX Designer to help drive new products in the Digital Asset space. As UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for

Leading a collaborative design process from conception to launch: partner with small, global teams of engineers, product managers, and researchers to identify user needs, define product strategy, and create roadmaps
Develop storyboards, prototypes, and high-fidelity visual design to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas
Actively give and solicit feedback from other designers in order to continually raise the bar for quality
Evangelize design and product thinking methodology
Fearlessly take on highly complex problem areas and then publish what you learn
Grow a design team as products mature
Job requirements
Required

You have 2-4+ years of experience working as a product designer on agile teams
Experience working with product design tools like Figma, Sketch, InVision, Principle for Mac, Flinto, Framer, Whimsical, or similar
You have solved complex problems with an elegant, shipped product—evidenced in an online portfolio featuring end-to-end product design
You demonstrate product vision and use data and experimentation to provide product direction.
While you may not have a branding or marketing background, you understand customer experience and the relationship between brand and product design
You're excellent at articulating design decisions, presenting to clients or stakeholders
You're effective at prototyping at varying levels of fidelity
You demonstrate solid leadership skills and an ability to develop strong partnerships with product managers and engineers
A strong portfolio that contains not just final solutions, but the iterative artifacts which demonstrates your thinking, as well as your role within that process
Bonus points for

You're interested in or have experience with decentralized applications and blockchain
You're interested in or have experience designing for financial applications
Willing to travel occasionally to meet global clients or conduct research
You have experience at both large organizations and start-ups
You are able to facilitate design thinking workshops
You enjoy some amount of ambiguity and freedom to experiment
You've built or worked with design systems
You have experience animating interactions and UI elements
You have front-end development experience
Other skills to demonstrate

Excellent verbal and written communication in French and English
Teamwork, flexibility, initiative, communication and organisation
Willingness to constantly learn & improve, challenging yourself to stay at the top of your game
Why join ConsenSys?
Here are some of the perks of being part of a unique organization like ConsenSys

The forefront of a revolution. At ConsenSys we fundamentally believe that a next generation of technologies presents the opportunity to create a more just and equitable society. We believe that there is an opportunity to bring the remaining 2 billion unbanked people into the global economy and to radically transform our society for the enrichment of humankind
A dynamic startup environment. ConsenSys is a thought leader in the blockchain space and we are absorbing a significant portion of the mindshare. This is both exciting and challenging, as we learn to scale our organization while adhering to the principles of decentralization
Deep technical challenges. This entire ecosystem is less than 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler. There is much to be done before these platforms can scale to the order of millions or billions of users. ConsenSys is building the technology platforms that can get us to those next thresholds of scale
Continuous learning and improvements. You'll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas and frameworks from your peers and as you work on different projects -- challenging you to stay at the top of your game
ConsenSys was named a Top 100 FinTech company by KPMG's 2016 Fintech Innovators report
A few important things to know

Some travel could be required. Projects may be on client sites, so our team members need to be flexible and up for travel. We do our best to take people's personal situations into account, but we know it's not for everyone
To apply for a role at our Paris office, you need to live in Paris and speak French fluently. If you do not meet these criteria, we are certainly able to find another role for you at ConsenSys

description:
The VMware Global Account Program is responsible to serve approximately 100 of VMware’s largest customers. These premier accounts are managed by a team of experienced Global Account Managers (GAM) with the objective to establish a significant VMWare footprint in the largest and most influential corporations worldwide. Our selling is focused on our customers primary business initiatives and connecting our value to our customers business value. Our Value Selling strategy is the investment of time, talent and technology from VMWare and our partners to invent (transform) our customers business for their benefit. This strategic objective is being accomplished using a highly focused and experienced account management, marketing, and engineering teams, as well as substantial executive level engagement.
The Global Accounts Manager will have principle responsibility for VMware sales to the most significant accounts within the VMware portfolio. The individual in this role will be responsible for overall account management including the creation and execution of the strategic account plan, goal obtainment and revenue growth. The GAM takes a consultative approach to selling and works toward a trusted advisor status serving as the executive contact across the customer on behalf of VMware, communicating VMware’s unique value. Leads overall account strategy and matrix management of sales, specialist and partner resources to ensure value-added benefits and deeper/wider reach into the customer. The GAM is responsible for taking share from our competitors.
*** Primary Objectives: ***
Sets the global account strategy that drives new VMware revenue through the ownership and implementation of an actionable, business-outcome based account plan
Oversees and implements business case & value selling strategies which align the customer’s needs, up to the Board/C-Suite, to VMware solutions and services including the development of business cases with specific metrics & ROIs identified
Manages tactical business while investing in larger, longer term strategic opportunities
Constructs and sells large multi-product, integrated solutions and services utilizing strategic partnerships which drive business outcomes
Maintains high touch and trusted advisor status with the customer establishing trust
Maintains operational command of the business through forecast accuracy and demand generation
Act as an inspired leader for a large extended team of virtual resources to ensure consistent and effective team engagement and ensuring optimal usage of resources across management, supporting and partner organizations
*** Experience Required: ***
A minimum of 10-years of experience in technology sales with increasing levels of responsibility
5+ years of experience as a Global/Strategic Account Manager
Established and referenceable relationships with key contacts in designated account(s)
Documented track record of proven success
Proven experience managing in a matrix work environment
Comfortable working with C level executives at Fortune 500 companies and building necessary business relationships throughout the organization
Familiar with Target Account Selling or other established sales methodology a plus
Knowledge of all facets of compute technologies
*** Core Competencies: ***
Consultative: Able to identify the customer's pain points and needs then suggest solutions to satisfy those needs
Business Acumen: Able to become the expert on the customer’s business, value drivers, organization, and industries
Challenger: Able to push the customer's thinking through a value-centric conversation educating them on new ways our solutions can provide benefits to their company
Innovative: Adapts communication and influencing styles to suit different audiences and capable of introducing new ideas or methods internally and to the customer
Financial Acumen: Knowledge & understanding of customer's financial situation along with the ability to discuss customer's outcomes in financial terms. Understanding of budgets, costs and price required.
Negotiator: Does not simply sell on price but negotiates value to outcomes; Understands the legal and contractual implications of the negations as well as financial.
- Executive Presence: Possess a blend of temperament, competencies and skills that empowers the ability to command a room and hold business-led conversations at the C- level
Globally-Minded: Understands the global aspects and cultures surrounding their customer and the various countries in which they operate
Self-starter: Takes initiative and works with limited direction
Adaptable: Adapts to changing circumstances and accepts new ideas and change initiatives
Collaborator: Excels at working collaboratively with their team, peers, supporting resources, partners, management and the customer
Strong Communication practices & Skills: Ability to write and speak in a way that clearly articulates a point of view; Understands how to involve all levels within the company (internal and external) with consistent, appropriate manner

Business Unit: Global Accounts: VMware’s Global Account team plays a vital role in our company’s success. We serve more than 100 of VMware’s largest customers, who contribute more than $1 billion a year in new product and services revenue. We’re obsessed with our customers’ success, and we’re laser-focused on finding new ways to help them overcome challenges, generate greater revenue, and exceed their business goals. Our key strategy is called Co-Innovation, where we work with customers to apply the right talent and technology from VMware and our partners to transform the customer’s business for their benefit. Are you ready to help us grow VMware’s presence among our premier customers? As part of our team, you’ll gain the skills, knowledge, experience, and confidence to boldly drive new business solutions for some of the world’s largest and most influential companies.

VMware Company Overview: VMware, we believe that software has the power to unlock new opportunities for people and our planet. We look beyond the barriers of compromise to engineer new ways to make technologies work together seamlessly. Our cloud, mobility, and security software form a flexible, consistent digital foundation for securely delivering the apps, services and experiences that are transforming business innovation around the globe. At the core of what we do are our people who deeply value execution, passion, integrity, customers, and community. Shape what’s possible today at http://careers.vmware.com.

Embedded Software Engineer (MCU) - AI
Snips is hiring!
About
Snips is an AI-powered voice platform for connected devices. It enables makers and companies to add voice recognition and understanding to their products or services.
Created in 2013, the vision behind Snips has been to put an AI assistant in every device, making technology so intuitive that it disappears into the background. They are now over 70 people, with offices in Paris, Tokyo, and New York.
What makes Snips unique is that everything runs locally on the device the user is speaking to, meaning no data ever gets sent to the cloud. This guarantees Privacy by Design and resilience to internet outages, making Snips the first ever voice technology to be GDPR compliant.
The Snips web platform was launched in June of 2017, and has grown 400% since then to over 23,000 developers creating voice apps
Snips is looking for passionate people who want to contribute to our vision to make technology disappear. More than a company, we see ourselves as a community that values purpose, inclusiveness, curiosity, grit and impact. We expect future Snipsters to be curious and want to learn continuously, helping each other solve the various problems they are working on.
Job Description
Snips is looking for an Embedded Software Engineer to join our MCU team in Paris.
You will help our Embedded Software Engineering team to push the boundaries of which Artificial Intelligence algorithms can run on micro controllers like Cortex-M4/M7. Optimisation is key to our development. You will also help us to expand our range of hardware on which we can run.
English is the official language of the company, as we have over 12 different nationalities, so don't worry if you don't speak French!
On top of a competitive salary, we offer many perks including relocation assistance and VISA sponsorships, laptops, voice development kits, language classes, sports classes, full health insurance, a transport card and free lunches!

Computer Science degree or any relevant field
C, Rust and C++ as a bonus
ARM micro controllers programming environment is a plus
Machine Learning is a plus
DSP programming is a plus

Reference check

description:
Site Reliability Engineers (SRE) at Algolia are both software and systems engineers that ensure we can reliably serve billions of queries every day, for users all around the world, despite datacenters being unavailable and undersea cables being cut. As we operate many services including our Search API, Places, DocSearch and Analytics, you’ll keep learning new things everyday and share what you have learned.

The platform we develop uses both virtual and bare-metal systems spanning over 50 data centers in 15 different regions serving millions of users from every corner of the globe. Since search is a critical component of many applications, the SRE team maintains a high level of expertise in system failures in order to prevent them and provide reliable service to our customers.

No two problems are the same because all the systems evolve all the time. We expect you to be a resilient problem solver who isn’t afraid to think outside of the box and use the knowledge of system interactions in your favor. You’ll also take ownership of complete projects and execute them.

The team is composed of engineers with different backgrounds and experience both in the industry and academia. The diversity works in our favour and you should increase it by bringing your experience, your knowledge and your point of view. Thinking differently is a plus, not a minus. We’re transparent with each other and to other teams both about our success and our failures. This way we learn, we accept our weaknesses and continuously strive to improve both personally and professionally.

Coming right from Sergio, from the SRE team: “If you want to grow yourself into a multidisciplinary environment, Algolia is the place to be. Our SRE team ensures the infrastructure is up and running with the minimum downtime possible. We use the right tool for the right job, with a strong value for ownership, you build and you run it. Besides we have a really flexible schedule, organize your day as you wish”.
YOUR ROLE WILL CONSIST OF:
Work with other teams to identify, troubleshoot, and resolve high impact issues
Evaluate performance of current and future systems, both software and hardware
Participate in design of new systems
Develop and maintain the automation framework used for all systems
Participate in on-call rotation to ensure fast response to production issues

A typical morning for Sergio looks like : "We have one sync meeting per week for our squad, where we know what each member of the team is working on or we comment the issues of the last on-call. The rest of the day I organize to work on the projects I'm involved"

YOU MIGHT BE A FIT IF YOU HAVE:
4+ years of software engineering experience
Knowledge of Shell scripting and at least one scripting language (Python, Ruby, etc.)
Willing to learn Go (golang)
Understanding of Linux systems: I/O, process scheduling, filesystems
Understanding of computer networks: TCP/IP, DNS, load-balancing
Full professional English proficiency
Rigor in high code quality, automated testing, and other engineering best practices
Ability to make independent decisions and taking ownership for them
NICE TO HAVE:
Knowledge of Go (golang)
Ability to use a configuration management tool like Ansible, Puppet or Chef
Knowledge of low level principles of computers and network components
Performance profiling of applications both in development and production
Knowledge of cloud platforms such AWS / GCP / Azure

We’re looking for someone who can live our values:
GRIT - Problem-solving and perseverance capability in an ever-changing and growing environment
TRUST - Willingness to trust our co-workers and to take ownership
CANDOR - Ability to receive and give constructive feedback.

description:
A propos de LaFourchette
Avec plus de 60 000 restaurants dans 18 pays, LaFourchette est aujourd’hui le leader de la réservation en ligne de restaurants en Europe et en Amérique latine. LaFourchette a rejoint le groupe TripAdvisor en mai 2014.
Notre mission est claire : devenir l’App #1 pour tous ceux qui veulent aller au restaurant. Dans ce cadre, nous cherchons à renforcer nos effectifs en 2019.
Contexte
LaFourchette a lancé depuis quelques mois une refonte de son SI en microservices. Dans le cadre de cette refonte, nous sommes aussi en train de déployer les nouvelles versions de nos produits phares :
notre portail web
notre outils de gestion de reservations (TheForkManager v3) utilisé par nos 60 000 partenaires.
Nos équipes sont organisées en feature team et notre équipe TFM Frontend Core est à la recherche d’un développeur.
L’équipe TFM Frontend Core que tu rejoindras a pour missions :
Amélioration de la “developer experience” autour du projet frontend TFM3 en proposant des outils adaptés aux problématiques des feature teams travaillant sur le projet.
Garantir la cohérence technique du projet en identifiant les optimisations à apporter au projet
Travailler avec l’équipe afin de s’assurer que l’application reste cohérente en terme de UX/UI
Réfléchir et mettre en place des POCs pour les prochaines modifications structurantes du projet
Construire les bases de la prochaine application native pour nos restaurants partenaires
Cette équipe est déjà constituée de 3 personnes réparties entre Paris et Nantes. Le poste est donc ouvert dans ces deux bureaux.
Techniquement, nous travaillons sur l’implémentation de micro-services en Node.js. Notre nouvelle architecture est en effet fortement orientée Node.js côté back-end, et React côté front-end. Nous assurons la communication avec nos services via JSON-RPC principalement. Côté APIs dédiées au front-end, nous privilégions GraphQL. Nous utilisons également RabbitMQ pour nos mécanismes de communication asynchrones. Pour les bases de données, PostgreSQL et MySQL sont nos amis. Pour le monitoring, Grafana, la stack ELK ainsi que Newrelic sont des outils que nous utilisons tous les jours.
Le tout sera bientôt propulsé sur une infrastructure orchestrée par Kubernetes et hébergée sur AWS.
Description du poste
Ton rôle dans l’équipe :
Tu participeras à la conception technique des projets, à leur développement, à leur déploiement et à leur évolution.
Tu collaboreras avec de nombreuses équipes internationales, sur divers sujets (Produit, Design, OPS, TripAdvisor…). A ce titre, un niveau correct en Anglais est apprécié.
Compétences requises :
Minimum 2 ans d’expérience sur des projets d’applications React.js utilisées à grande échelle incluant :
mise en place de builds Webpack
optimisation de performances (applicative, build)
manipulation SVG
Tu aimes le travail en équipe et tu communiques particulièrement bien avec tes interlocuteurs variés (IT, produit, support, stakeholders, etc.). Dans notre équipe, la communication prévaut et est le moteur de la réussite de celle-ci à l’échelle de l’entreprise.
Tu es dynamique, proactif et te sens en mesure d’apporter des idées nouvelles.
Force de proposition pour résoudre les problèmes que tu rencontres
Compétences appréciées :
Expérience avec les librairies Jest, Cypress, React-testing-library
Expérience en GraphQl & Apollo est un plus
Une expérience à l’international ou en remote est un plus. Nous sommes en effet en collaboration étroite avec d’autres collaborateurs à Paris, Amsterdam, Turin, Lisbonne...
D’autres choses sympa si tu décides de nous rejoindre :
De nouveaux locaux : un baby-foot, une table de ping-pong, une quiet room, des afterworks, des bières...
Des fruits et des petit-dejs toute les semaines,
Des Tickets Restaurant,
Beaucoup d’autres choses !
Tu penses que ton expérience et tes compétences vont nous permettre de construire LaFourchette du futur ? Envoie nous ton CV et rencontrons-nous :)

Passionate about tech? Interested in Energy? Come work for Kayrros, a fast-growing start-up using artificial intelligence to transform the world’s biggest industry.
Kayrros is headquartered in Paris, with offices in New York, Houston, London, and Singapore. By working for Kayrros, you will join an energetic team of 100 people, with diverse professional backgrounds—from data science and petroleum engineering to sales and marketing—and over 15 different nationalities and 10 spoken languages.
Our team of energy experts and tech wizards are working to bring transparency to the global energy market. We employ innovative technologies, like satellite imagery processing and artificial intelligence, to capture and analyse data across the energy sector. Combined with our expert analysis, we give our clients valuable information on global market movements to make better business decisions—whether that’s trading, investing or managing their operations.
In September 2018, Kayrros received €21M in Serie B funding to continue breaking the boundaries of the energy market.
Interested in operating at the intersection of energy and the data revolution? Get in touch!
We are currently recruiting for our Paris office,
a Junior Data Engineer M/F (6 months)
Data Engineers play a central role in Kayrros. Working hand in hand with Data Scientists and Energy Analysts they gather and process raw data at scale and work closely with Software Engineers to integrate innovations and algorithms into our production system.
As a data engineer, you will therefore have to:
Convert prototypes into reliable products
Architect, build and test industry-grade data pipelines
Provide technical support to Data Scientists during exploratory analysis
Work closely with computer vision researchers to integrate and scale their algorithms
Evaluate performance and optimize all parts of the stack
Continuously provide ideas to improve products
Technology stack
Languages: Python, Java, C
Tools : Message brokers (RabbitMQ, Kafka), traitement de la donnée (Sci-kit learn, Pandas), imagerie (Rasterio, Gdal, Fiona…), tests (Unittest...)
Stack data: Hadoop (Apache Spark, Hbase…), Elasticsearch...
Infrastructure: Docker, Rancher, OpenIO, Gitlab...
Profile
This is an ideal opportunity if you are looking for a six-month contract starting immediately and you want to join a fast-growing start-up.
Strong Python 3 Engineer able to write reusable, testable and efficient code and coach others in doing so
Passion and proven record building data pipelines with an emphasis on software engineering, software architecture, code quality, best practices
You are dynamic, curious and eager to learn about the energy industry
You can work in a fast-paced environment
You can communicate clearly in English, including with non-technical people
You are willing to contribute actively and have a real impact to the company success
You can easily work in an UNIX environment
Optionally: experience with some components of our current stack: Spark, Docker, Elasticsearch, Pandas, Scikit-learn
Why joining Kayrros?
We are a young, fast-growing tech company and are extremely passionate about what we do.
We are located in the WeWork building on Rue la Fayette, 75009 (free drinks, events and a vibrant atmosphere).
You will work with an international team and practice your English (or Chinese, German, Swedish, Portuguese...) on a day to day basis.
Recruitment process
Send your CV specifying the type of contract and your availability
A phone interview (HR or Product Manager)
A technical challenge (Code challenge)
A physical interview (Team member + HR interview + Product Manager)
The whole process will last one month at the maximum.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: 1,700.00€ /month

description:
Airbus Defence and Space SAS
Airbus is a global leader in aeronautics, space and related services. In 2018 it generated revenues of € 64 billion and employed a workforce of around 134,000. Airbus offers the most comprehensive range of passenger airliners. Airbus is also a European leader providing tanker, combat, transport and mission aircraft, as well as one of the world's leading space companies. In helicopters, Airbus provides the most efficient civil and military rotorcraft solutions worldwide.

Our people work with passion and determination to make the world a more connected, safer and smarter place. Taking pride in our work, we draw on each other's expertise and experience to achieve excellence. Our diversity and teamwork culture propel us to accomplish the extraordinary - on the ground, in the sky and in space.
Job Description
Contact :
Please apply on line for this vacancy on line at our careers site (www.jobs.airbus.com) with your CV and cover letter attached.

By submitting your CV or application you are consenting to Airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. This information will only be used by Airbus.

Description of the job :
Airbus Defence and Space is looking for an experienced Software Development Engineer
(f/m) to lead the development and maintenance of our Maritime Surveillance software solution and associated projects.

This position is located in Bezons, suburb of Paris.

As a software engineer, your main task will be to develop and maintain software components
for the STYRIS® product according to the R&D roadmap. You will be also in charge of specific software to meet specific customer requests.
You will also be in charge of correcting and maintaining new important software features on
product and projects, based on product specification and requirements. You will report to the
Software Management Team Leader (TECSB6-TL2) and have as main interfaces the software development team, the product management team, and system engineers.

This position offers an exciting opportunity to work on large-scale projects. It presents unique
challenges and enables a strong sense of accomplishment.

STYRIS® is an AIRBUS product line for collection, processing, consolidation, enrichment,
distribution and display of data deriving from a wide range of maritime sensors such as radars, automatic identification system, radio direction finder, cameras, weather stations and sonars.
STYRIS® is based on a modular system architecture allowing a user-friendly integration, and
ergonomic HMI to enable operators to monitor and interact with critical maritime situations, and provide the means to quickly communicate to all relevant authorities.
Airbus Defence and Space is providing for more than 20 years integrated maritime safety and security solutions to Port authorities, Coast Guards, Navies and also commercial
administration all around the world. Over 250 Systems are in service in over 50 countries 20
are currently under development. 85% of our business is international.

Task & accountabilities :
Software Development
Technical lead for the software product design and implementation: new software specification and design, development, testing (unit and functional) and delivery (release note and packaging) to meet customer and R&D needs
Responsible for planning and delivering the engineering commitment OTOCOQ for software delivery
Provide remote support to system integration and maintenance teams
Fix non-conformity raised by project, product integration and validation teams
Contribute actively to STYRIS® product roadmap definition in close relationship with product management team

Required skills :
Education : Master or diploma in computer science or a comparable field of study
Practical experience : 3+ years of successful experience as Software Engineer.
Successful experience in software development JAVA SE (6, 7 and 8) and good knowledge in C/C++
Strong experience in software factory tools such Eclipse, SVN, Maven, Jenkins, Nexus, SonarQ, JIRA, ....
Linux/Windows infrastructure architecture and administration
Familiar with software architecture and design (UML, Enterprise Architect, ...)
Experience in Linux/Windows infrastructure architecture and virtualization
Awareness of Systems and distributed Command & Control
Organized and autonomous
Capability to learn fast
Team player and cooperative
Rigorous, loyal and curious

Specific knowledge
JAVA SE (6, 7 and 8) programming language
JAVA SWING and JAVA FX for HMI development
Software factory tools such Eclipse,SVN, Maven, Jenkins, Nexus, SonarQ and JIRA.
luent in French (Oral and writing)
B2 (Upper-Intermediate) in English (Oral and writing)

This job requires an awareness of any potential compliance risks and a commitment to act with integrity, as the foundation for the Company’s success, reputation and sustainable growth.

By submitting your CV or application you are consenting to Airbus using and storing information about you for monitoring purposes relating to your application or future employment. This information will only be used by Airbus.
Airbus is committed to achieving workforce diversity and creating an inclusive working environment. We welcome all applications irrespective of social and cultural background, age, gender, disability, sexual orientation or religious belief.

description:
About us

Zenly started in 2011 as a small team of passionate designers, engineers, and entrepreneurs gathered around the idea that frictionless location sharing is the next mobile commodity. Our R&D has brought us to release the best location sharing app in the world ;)

And now, Zenly is the mobile application that lets you instantaneously see where your friends are. We believe that making maps more social and personalised is our opportunity to improve the way people live, communicate and share moments together. Our product empowers people to find themselves, enjoy improvised moments and have fun together.
Role

Our Android app is 50% Java, 50% Kotlin as we develop new features using it and continue to migrate old Java classes to Kotlin. We have an extensive use of RxJava for communicating data flow from and to the UI through various threading mechanisms. As weird as it might sound, we also embed a custom library compiled from Go to help us handle complex heuristics that we can share between iOS and Android (maintained by a separated team even if you are welcome contributing to it).
Zenly is a very graphical app and as such, your work will be split between custom UI components, gestures, lots of animations and architectural challenges driven by the high level of communication between all different parts of the app.
You will work with passionated product and engineering people (mostly pure Android fanboys) to make Zenly one of the best Android app on the Play Store.
You will ensure a high standard of coding, following best practices and continuous integration processes. In your code, you will keep our core values in mind: usability, security and customer service.
Responsibilities
Architecting, developing, maintaining and releasing features as well as contributing to the core foundations of the Zenly mobile app
Push the limits of mobile devices and create great user experiences
Evaluate technical tradeoffs of every decision and work with design on the best UI and infrastructure practices
Write clear, maintainable, portable, and highly functional code
Accurately estimate schedules and deliver high quality work products to that schedule
Requirements
5+ years min of experience in developing mobile applications
Excellent knowledge of the Android SDK (View architecture, Measure/Layout/Draw, Architecture Components, Theming, etc..)
Strong experience of multi-threading and memory management specific to mobile devices
Solid software engineering practices (separation of concerns, testing, code reviews, continuous integration, design documentation…)
Excellent organization, prioritization and time management skills
Self-motivated and energetic team player with a very strong work ethic and cooperative attitude
Bonus
Experience building a mobile app from scratch to the Play Store
Experience in RxJava
Experience with maps and geographical data (OpenStreetMap, Vector tiles, GIS)
Experience with graphics programming and low-level graphics APIs ((DirectX/OpenGL/equivalent)
Perks

Our office in the Bastille area is built on 3 floors around a green atrium. It has a fully equipped kitchen, rest areas, and sound isolation booths. We also put up a climbing wall between 2 floors and a massive trampoline :)
Everyone at Zenly is offered a great package including:
Competitive salary and stock options
International phone allowance
Gym membership allowance
100% coverage of your health insurance: for you, your partner, and your family
100% coverage of your public transportation title
Fun: Trips abroad every year with the whole team (Sicilia in 2018)
Pet-friendly offices
Yoga classes
Free drinks and snacks of all kinds (homemade pastry, fruits, etc.)
Flexible time off policy
Handling of relocation/visa procedure
Applying
We are more interested in your experiences and projects, past and current, than your résumé. We'd rather hear about these and what you think you'll bring to the team. GitHub and Twitter usernames are also useful to share. All applications should be made in English.

description:
Planning Engineer

Company Summary

TechnipFMC is a global oil and gas leader, specialized in subsea, onshore, offshore, and surface technologies. Our mission: to enhance the performance of world’s energy industry. How we do it: by constantly challenging conventions and investing in our 37 000+ employees, across 48 countries. At TechnipFMC, we aim to offer an inspiring working experience: tackling some of the most complex technical and engineering challenges in the world in collaboration with a truly global team.

Introduction to the Job

At TechnipFMC, we deliver critical projects of a scale, scope and difficulty that you simply won’t find anywhere else. We are looking for a Planning Engineer who can join our multicultural team in Paris
Reporting to the Proposal/contract project manager, you will be working as a project planner for the SUBSEA segment. Your main activities include:
Accompanying and supporting the project manager in managing the project in terms of time, cost and risk.
Providing tools and keys to set priorities
Setting up the project plan goals by using the necessary resources
Overseeing the project plan and ensuring the forecast reliability.
Acquiring technical skills on the different disciplines of the project in order to develop a better understanding of them.
Gaining a foothold in the project and an experience that would head the career towards the management.
Developing and demonstrating the leadership through transversal management of project teams in a multicultural environment.
Providing an overview of the main planning risks to the Project Director and proposing alternative plans that can be implemented to make up for the delays.
You are meant for this job if you have/are:
Engineering degree or its equivalent
Beginner or 2-3 years of experience within the planning department
Nice to have:
Good knowledge of IT planning tools/software (Pimavera P6 / MS Project).
Good knowledge of EPCI work processes.
Fluent English (written and oral)
Knowledge of Office Pack, Power BI and VB programming
Your future at TechnipFMC
Potential career path, if possible
Global mobility opportunities if relevant
Training and development
Diverse and international team if relevant
Learn more about TechnipFMC
Learn more about us and find other open positions at our Career Page.
Follow us on LinkedIn for company updates.

The PROVIDER will ensure the following tasks for the discipline discipline:
Ensure a good understanding of instructions from Paris
Ensure coordination between the secondary structure (Mumbai) and the primary structure (Paris)
Conduct targeted audits to ensure that the Mumbai design complies with project procedures and instructions
Ensure that reviews of selling documents are done
Ensure that actions approved with Paris are implemented
Ensure that quantity, weight and gravity center tracking is in place, and make targeted verifications
Ensure that the schedule is consistent and that the adjustments requested in Mumbai are relevant
Participate in the development of responses to customer and site comments and questions
Participate in weekly meetings between Paris and Mumbai and between disciplines in Mumbai
Participate actively in resolving issues that prevent progression as planned
Reporting to the Parisian business manager.



The basic documents made available to the SERVICE PROVIDER are:
The Technical Annexes of the Contract.
The particular rules of the project.
The study standards of the project.
Implementations of works.
Project coordination procedures.
A complete file of all up-to-date project documentation is always available after the Business Manager.



It will be essential to follow the rules of the project, the Rules of the Art as well as the Quality Assurance procedures applicable to this project, in particular as regards the production of calculation notes.
Required profile

The studies at the expense of the PROVIDER require the following skills:
Mastering the specificities of design and structural calculation of FPSO modules.
Mastery of the know-how of modular offshore construction
Control of offshore regulations (API, AISC).
Mastery of the SACS structure calculation software.
Knowledge of engineering cycles related to secondary structural design
Ability to work with the standards, rules and study instructions of the project concerned.
Coordination capacity with other specialties.
Proficiency in technical English (reading / understanding of technical documents).
Synthesis capacity and technical reporting to the Business Manager.
For this assignment, the SERVICE PROVIDER must set up personnel with a minimum of 5 years of experience as a structural engineer on offshore module retail execution projects.
English - language of the contract
Education - Civil Engineer / Metal frame

Job Opening
RF Project Engineer

Rec ruitment
RF Project Engineer
MVG Industries Villejust (91)
Microwave Vision Group is a leading supplier of antenna measurement systems with 360
employees and a revenue of approximately €74.6M.
Our main client base is in the sectors of Aeronautics and Defense, Civil Telecommunications and
Automotive.
Our company deploys its systems engineering throughout our thirteen different locations
around the world (Asia, United States, Europe).
Reporting to the Director of Operations, you are in charge of managing domestic and
international projects on standard and complex multidisciplinary systems (involving mechanics,
electronics, and software) within the Antenna Measurement Systems (AMS) business, the
group's core business. As such, you have a versatile role in the management of these projects
and are the customer interface from the purchase order to the validation of the acceptance
report.
Your responsibilities:
Carry out the contract review, translate the client's requirements,
Ensure the technical definition of the project (power budget, error budget, requirements
document, etc.),
Define and monitor manufacturing, installation and acceptance schedule of the equipment in
coordination with the manufacturing and maintenance teams,
Define and monitor the budget,
Carry out purchase requests, monitor suppliers and ensure the parts delivery in coordination
with the purchasing teams,
Validate Factory Acceptance Tests,
Carry out the Site Acceptance Tests at the customer's premises,
Provide customer training on our measurement systems
Provide technical support to our sales teams in order to prepare technical and financial
proposals.
You will evolve within the project department and must demonstrate strong skills in managing
customer relations (promotion of the designed solutions, deadline management, management
of customer requests, priorities, etc.). You are comfortable in a multicultural and international
environment, which will allow you, among other things, to easily and often travel abroad which
is required to succeed in this position. You will be in constant contact with manufacturing,
mechanical department, product development and sales teams.
Rec ruitment
,
With a master s degree in electrical engineering and a specialization in radio frequency
(antennas, microwaves), you have a significant experience of 2 to 4 years in the management of
industrial projects and radio frequency systems. You are rigorous, you have strong interpersonal
skills that will allow you to build and maintain a constructive relationship with international
clients. You enjoy teamwork and you speak English with full professional proficiency.

Position based in Villejust (91) (ZA Courtabœuf)

Ingénieur développement logiciel cybersécurité (H/F) / Software Cyber security engineer (M/F)
Parrot Faurecia - Paris 10e (75)
titre_poste: Ingénieur développement logiciel cybersécurité (H/F) / Software Cyber security engineer (M/F)
date_publication:
il y a 30+ jours
- Continuer pour postuler
Signaler cette offre d'emploi
description:
Vous souhaitez intégrer une entreprise française, innovante et agile ?

Rejoignez Faurecia Clarion Electronics, alliant un esprit start-up à un équipementier automobile de 1er rang, pour développer le cockpit du futur !

L’activité automobile de Parrot a été racheté à 100% par Faurecia en 2018 et a donné naissance à Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe : 4ème Business Group de Faurecia.

Au cœur de Paris, nos équipes conçoivent des technologies innovantes en développant des interfaces homme-machine sous Android auto pour offrir au client final une expérience connectique intuitive.
Nos solutions électroniques embarquées sont dotées de processeurs graphiques multi-cœur puissants afin de répondre plus rapidement à diverses instructions simultanées.

Relevez avec nous l'un des plus grands challenges de l'industrie automobile !

Nous recherchons un Ingénieur développement logiciel cybersécurité (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Au sein de l’équipe Software cyber security, vous participerez à la sécurisation des produits au travers de développements liés à la sécurité, de revue logicielle et de support aux équipes développement.

MISSIONS

En tant qu'Ingénieur développement logiciel cybersécurité, vos missions seront les suivantes :
Supporter les équipes de développement sur les sujets de cybersécurité
Lister et évaluer les risques d’attaques depuis l’architecture des produits.
Prendre part aux conférences téléphoniques avec le client
Participer aux revues d’exigences sur la sécurité
Développer sur cible
Contribuer au développement d’outils de vérification
Participer à l’amélioration continue des process de cybersécurité

PROFIL

Vous êtes diplômé d'une école d'ingénieur ou d'Un Master 2 et avez minimum 2 ans d'expérience dans le développement Logiciel embarqué et/ ou en cybersécurité.

Vous maîtrisez impérativement le développement C/C++ sous Linux. Dans l'idéal, vous maîtrisez également GIT, Java, Android mais ce n'est pas indispensable.

Votre niveau d’anglais vous permet d’échanger à l’écrit et à l’oral, vous maîtrisez notamment le vocabulaire technique.

INFORMATIONS SUPPLEMENTAIRES

Nous déménageons en fin d'année dans le 12ème arrondissement : 40 avenue des Terroirs de France.

Nous aurons une salle de sport, un restaurant inter-entreprise, une conciergerie et des locaux tout neufs !

Vous aurez également droit à :
10 jours de RTT
des tickets restaurant d'une valeur de 9€ par jour
une prise en charge de votre abonnement de transport à hauteur de 50%

EN - Would you like to be part of a French company known for its innovation and agility?

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

In the heart of Paris, our teams design innovative technologies by developing man-machine interfaces under Android auto to offer the end customer an intuitive connectivity experience.
Our embedded electronics solutions are equipped with powerful multi-core graphics processors to respond more quickly to various simultaneous instructions.

Take up with us one of the greatest challenges in the automotive industry!

We are looking for a Software Cyber security engineer (M/F)

CONTEXT

As part of the Software cyber security team, you will participate in product security through security related developments, software review and support to development teams.

MISSIONS

As a Cybersecurity Software Development Engineer, your missions will be as follows:
Support development teams on cyber security issues
List and evaluate the risks of attacks from the product architecture.
Participate in conference calls with the client
Participate in security requirements reviews
Develop on target
Contribute to the development of verification tools
Participate in the continuous improvement of cyber security processes

PROFILE

You are a graduate of an engineering school or a Master 2 and have at least 2 years of experience in embedded software development and/or cybersecurity.

You must be proficient in C/C++ development on Linux. Ideally, you also master GIT, Java, Android but this is not essential.

Your level of English allows you to exchange in writing and orally, you master technical vocabulary in particular.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

At the end of the year, we move to the 12th arrondissement: 40 avenue des Terroirs de France.
We will have a gym, an inter-company restaurant, a concierge service and brand new premises!

You will also be entitled to:
10 days of RTT
meal tickets worth 9€ per day
50% coverage of your transport subscription

description:
Fondée en 2007 et basée à Paris, Devialet est la start-up la plus primée au monde pour ses inventions d’excellence dans le domaine du son. À l'origine de l'épopée Devialet, l'ADH®, une invention brevetée qui a révolutionné le monde de l’amplification. Cette innovation, qui confine à l'impossible, a permis de croiser les technologies analogique et numérique pour restituer un son d'une qualité jamais atteinte jusqu'alors.

Chez Devialet, nous conduisons au quotidien la plus belle et la plus excitante des aventures. Chaque jour, nos équipes commerciales, retail, marketing, design, financières, logistiques, R&D, réinventent des façons de travailler pour donner accès au plus grand nombre à un son d’une qualité et d’une émotion incomparables, via nos technologies et nos produits de rupture. De Hong Kong à New-York en passant par Londres et Munich, nous recrutons des forces vives pour nous aider à repousser les limites du possible.

Rejoignez-nous, osez l’aventure !

MISSIONS
Dans le cadre du développement de nouveaux produits et de nouvelles applications dans le domaine automobile, vous intégrerez l’équipe acoustique et traitement du signal et évoluerez sur les missions suivantes :
Participer, avec les ingénieurs dédiés, au développement des nouvelles solutions de traitement du signal sonore et des architectures acoustiques pour le Car Audio
Participer à la définition des besoins de la chaîne audio en relation avec nos partenaires : écritures des spécifications techniques (haut-parleur, ampli…) et suivi des échanges techniques et commerciaux avec les fournisseurs, notamment en phase de chiffrage amont
Mettre en place des protocoles de mesures acoustiques en véhicule permettant de s'assurer de la conformité du système avec le cahier des charges initial
Contribuer à la mise au point des procédures de réglages en voiture
Proposer des améliorations aux solutions d'intégration de haut-parleurs dans les véhicules, en partenariat avec les fabricants automobiles ou de façon autonome
Contribuer à l'instrumentation liée à l'activité Car Audio (choix de matériel, maintenance…)
Faciliter l'implémentation sur diverses plateformes numériques des algorithmes développés en apportant un support au développement du code embarqué.
Vous serez amené(e) à intervenir dans des projets en autonomie au sein d'une équipe multidisciplinaire. Dans ce cadre, votre rôle sera le suivant :
Développer des démonstrateurs pour les phases de prospection et assurer les démonstrations
Assurer le réglage de la chaîne algorithmique audio sur les différentes plateformes
Réaliser le suivi de l'intégration des solutions et de sa validation en coopération avec l'équipe software embarqué
Concevoir et réaliser les outils nécessaires à l'automatisation des réglages et des portages
Faciliter les développements de l'équipe mécanique par du développement d'outils et du support à la mesure
Réaliser un reporting régulier.

PROFIL
De formation Ingénieur ou équivalent, vous disposez de 5 à 10 ans d'expérience en traitement de signal audio
Autonome, créatif et rigoureux, vous avez de grandes capacités organisationnelles et relationnelles
Vous souhaitez vous investir dans un projet ambitieux et innovant d'envergure mondiale
Esprit d'analyse, de synthèse et reporting

COMPÉTENCES REQUISES
Très bonne connaissance du traitement de signal et des algorithmes de traitement du son
Maîtrise des logiciels suivants : Matlab, MaxMSP, DAW...
Bonne connaissance des outils de mesures électro-acoustique : AudioPrecision, Klippel ou équivalent
Connaissances avérées des projets R&D audio pour le secteur automobile
Bonne connaissance des mesures acoustiques de caractérisation d'un système audio
Forte autonomie dans la réalisation de vos missions et la priorisation de vos objectifs
