Nous recherchons un Ingénieur reconnaissance vocale - développement logiciel C et C++ - (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Vous devrez spécifier, développer, intégrer et tester les nouvelles fonctionnalités de la reconnaissance vocale et s'assurer de leurs bons fonctionnements (maintenance technique et tests).

En charge du développement et de la maintenance de la librairie logicielle pilotant les moteurs de reconnaissance vocale et de synthèse vocale, vous devrez faire preuve de rigueur et de réactivité.
Vous devrez aussi répondre à des exigences de méthodologie en étant capable de spécifier les fonctions supportées et d'apporter le support technique et conseils.

MISSIONS

Vous ferez partie d'une équipe diversifiée (navigation, traductions, reco vocale) au sein de laquelle différents sujets d'expertise et d'innovation sont évalués, intégrés et optimisés.

Rattaché(e) au manager des activités transverses de l'Auto (reconnaissance vocale, navigation, traductions), vous devrez remplir les tâches suivantes :

Spécifier les nouveaux développements répondant aux demandes clients Internes/Externes
Développer la librairie logicielle communiquant avec les moteurs de synthèse et reconnaissance vocale
Intégrer/Tester les nouveaux développements effectués et définir les tests associés
Gérer la résolution des problèmes en interface avec notamment :
les différentes équipes internes développant les autres fonctionnalités
le service validation
les fournisseurs
Apporter le support technique sur l'utilisation de la reconnaissance vocale
Evaluer les nouvelles fonctionnalités et technologies (ASR/TTS)

Vous devrez faire preuve de réactivité et d'implication sur un domaine en perpétuel évolution. Vous devrez vous tenir informé(e) des nouvelles technologies liées au monde Android et aux différentes innovations liées à la reconnaissance vocale.

A ce titre, vous aurez pour responsabilités :
Garantir le bon fonctionnement de la librairie logicielle en charge de la reconnaissance/synthèse vocale pour l'ensemble des projets
Participer à l'élaboration et la mise en place de la nouvelle plateforme de reconnaissance vocale
Apporter du support sur la thématique « Reco Vocale » : conseils, méthodes, outils

PROFIL

Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme d'ingénieur, d'un master, ou d'un PhD (idéalement traitement de la parole) (BAC+5) et justifiez d'une expérience de 2 à 5 ans dans les secteurs de la reconnaissance vocale ou de l'automobile.

Vous avez de solides compétences en développement informatique (C, C++, Python, …) et une bonne compréhension des technologies liées à la reconnaissance vocale.
Vous maîtrisez le C embarqué et les outils GNU.
Vous possédez aussi des connaissances ou des expériences en développement Java.
Vous avez des capacités à traiter des données structurées ou non structurées, de types variés (SQL, HTML, XML).
Une connaissance des outils GIT, Atlassian (JIRA, Confluence), dans les domaines du Traitement de la parole, d'Android, et des outils Nuance seraient également appréciées.
Vous montrez un fort intérêt et une bonne connaissance de l'écosystème Android.

Vous faites preuve de rigueur, d'une grande curiosité et d'une forte capacité d'initiative.
Vous êtes soucieux(se) du détail, et avez d'excellentes compétences analytiques.
Vous parlez couramment l'anglais.

Des déplacements à l'étranger sont à prévoir.

EN - Would you like to be part of a French company known for its innovation and agility?

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

In the heart of Paris, our teams design innovative technologies by developing man-machine interfaces under Android auto to offer the end customer an intuitive connectivity experience.
Our embedded electronics solutions are equipped with powerful multi-core graphics processors to respond more quickly to various simultaneous instructions.

Take up with us one of the greatest challenges in the automotive industry!

We are looking for a C/C++ Software development Engineer - Vocal Recognition (M/F)

CONTEXT

You will have to specify, develop, integrate and test the new voice recognition functionalities and ensure that they work properly (technical maintenance and tests).
In charge of developing and maintaining the software library that drives the speech recognition and speech synthesis engines, you will have to be rigorous and responsive.
You will also have to meet methodological requirements by being able to specify the supported functions and to provide technical support and advice.

MISSIONS

You will be part of a diversified team (navigation, translations, voice reception) in which different subjects of expertise and innovation are evaluated, integrated and optimized.

Reporting to the manager of the transversal activities of the Auto (voice recognition, navigation, translations), you will have to perform the following tasks:
Specify new developments in response to internal/external customer requests
Develop the software library communicating with text-to-speech and speech recognition engines
Integrate/Test new developments and define associated tests
Manage the resolution of problems interfacing with, in particular:
the various internal teams developing the other functionalities
the validation service
the suppliers
Provide technical support on the use of voice recognition
Evaluate new features and technologies (ASR/TTS)

You will have to be responsive and involved in a constantly evolving field. You will need to stay informed about new technologies related to the Android world and the various innovations related to speech recognition.

As such, you will be responsible for:
Ensure the proper functioning of the software library in charge of speech recognition/synthesis for all projects
Participate in the development and implementation of the new speech recognition platform
Provide support on the theme "Reco Vocale": advice, methods, tools

PROFILE

You have an engineering degree, a master's degree, or a PhD (ideally speech processing) (BAC+5) and have 2 to 5 years' experience in the voice recognition or automotive sectors.

You have strong computer development skills (C, C++, Python,...) and a good understanding of speech recognition technologies.
You are familiar with embedded C and GNU tools.
You also have knowledge or experience in Java development.
You have the ability to process structured or unstructured data of various types (SQL, HTML, XML).
Knowledge of GIT, Atlassian (JIRA, Confluence), speech processing, Android, and Nuance tools would also be appreciated.
You show a strong interest and knowledge of the Android ecosystem.

You are rigorous, curious and have a strong capacity for initiative.
You are detail-oriented and have excellent analytical skills.
You are fluent in English.

Travel abroad is to be expected.

meta1:
Senior Data Software Engineer (F/H)
AXA Global Re - Paris (75)
date_publication:
AXA - il y a 7 mois
- Continuer pour postuler
Signaler cette offre d'emploi
description:
Mission
AXA Global Parametrics is looking for a senior data software engineer who will lead the data developments in the team to achieve business requirements for the next couple of years. Those business requirements include index-based insurance products standardization as well as building the new vision of AXA Global Parametrics in terms of loss-based insurance, including image-based loss assessment and new services.

Main roles and responsibilities
In collaboration with the rest of the team, and particularly the engineering manager, the product owners, and the head of tech & data, the senior data software engineer will:
1. Contribute actively to the definition of AGP “Tech & Data” Strategy
Participate to business products discussion and bring vision, particularly according to data topics
Choice of technological stacks (mainly cloud but not only)
Architecture design
Participate to recruitment phases (whether internal or external workforce)
Give feedback about product/features prioritization and staffing

2. Build high quality products
Following an agile working methodology (frameworks, sprints, rituals, roles, …)
Following engineering good practices (clean code, pair coding, code reviews, test first, continuous integration and continuous delivery, tres amigos, …)
Ensuring products compliance with group security and regulatory guidelines
Helping colleagues and external workforce follow those same quality requirements

3. Ensure BAU & maintenance while products are live
Participate to platform upgrades
Switch into corrective and evolutionary maintenance when needed
Help Build components monitoring for an effective quality of service
In terms of components, the senior data software engineering will have to cover all the value chain, for both index-based and loss-based parametric insurance covers:
Data sourcing
Data storage, preparation and lineage
Data transformation pipelines and pricing tools (mainly R, Python)
Back-end (SQL and NoSQL databases, application exposure through data service layers toward external and internal world)
Front-ends (for AGP team, brokers, customers, …)
Other Internal IT solutions (customers, contracts, claims, policy management, …)
Qualifications
Education:
Computer Science (engineering school, master, PhD) with excellent programming skills and a good understanding of data science and statistics + image analysis

Language:
Conversational level in English required
Fluency in French desired

Required skills:
Strong experience as a data software engineer
An experience as a computer vision engineer is a +
An experience in a Big Data Environment is a +
Good knowledge of main cloud providers (AWS, MS, …)
Good knowledge of main data, back, and front-end frameworks : JS, Java/C#, NodeJs, Python/Dash, R/Shiny, Tensorflow, PyTorch, SQL and NoSQL DB, numpy, scikit-learn, gensim, nltk, …
Good knowledge and usage of CI/CD and Docker technologies
Strong autonomy and ability to work in a fast-changing world
Rigorous in the delivery
Team spirit

About AXA
Would you like to wake up every day driven and inspired by our noble mission and to work together as one global team to empower people to live a better life? Here at AXA we strive to lead the transformation of our industry. We are looking for talented individuals who come from varied backgrounds, think differently and want to be part of this exciting transformation by challenging the status quo so we can push AXA - a leading global brand and one of the most innovative companies in our industry - onto even greater things.
In a fast-evolving world and with a presence in 64 countries, our 165,000 employees and exclusive distributors anticipate change to offer services and solutions tailored to the current and future needs of our 107 million customers
AXA, as one of the world leaders in financial protection, supports and advises its customers in three major business lines: Property & Casualty Insurance, Life & Savings, and Asset Management. Since 2014, AXA’s parametric insurance team has developed market-leading products to insure against climate risks. Clients range from individuals and corporations to governments and public institutions; they come from various weather-sensitive sectors across the world including agriculture, renewable energy, construction, transportation, leisure, and textiles.

Data scientists, meteorologists, business developers, underwriters and IT make up the parametric insurance team. Working closely together, they create innovative insurance products that meet clients’ needs.

What We Offer
If you want to join a dynamic and challenging environment, do not hesitate to apply !

Nous recherchons un Ingénieur conception électronique (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Dans l'objectif de renforcer nos équipes, nous recrutons un ingénieur de conception Hardware. Vos missions seront : développer, concevoir et qualifier tout ou partie de l'électronique d'un système d'Infotainment Android. Vous travaillerez avec une équipe projet multi-compétences Mécanique, Logiciel, Validation, Achat et Commerce au déploiement de notre gamme de produit d'Infotainment chez les constructeurs automobiles.

MISSIONS

Vos missions seront les suivantes :
Participer à la rédaction du cahier des charges et des spécifications Hardware
Assurer la conception électronique en respectant les procédures internes
Suivre la sous-traitance (appels d'offre, support technique, spécifications techniques, respect des délais)
Elaborer le plan de test du produit en respectant les procédures internes
Qualifier les prototypes selon le plan de test
Transmettre et maintenir le dossier d'industrialisation (spécification du banc de test, BOM et GERBER) au service Industrialisation via l'outil SAP-PLM
Capitaliser le savoir-faire

Vous serez responsable de la conception hardware de tout ou partie d'un produit.
Vous travaillerez en étroite collaboration avec l'équipe projet (logiciel, mécanique, validation, …)
Vous devrez respecter les délais de conception imposés par la gestion projet et/ou la direction.

PROFIL

Compétences techniques :

Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme d'ingénieur à dominante électronique, jeune diplômé ou jusqu'à à 5 ans d'expérience au sein du secteur automobile, aéronautique ou des télécommunications.

Vous disposez des compétences techniques indispensables en conception électronique selon le cycle en V. Vous maîtrisez les différentes structures d'alimentation à découpage ou linéaire, l'intégrité des signaux et vous avez de bonnes notions de CEM.

Dans l'idéal, vous avez des connaissances en Orcad et SPICE et la capacité à évaluer le comportement thermique d'un produit / interpréter le résultat de simulation thermique.

Savoir -être :

Vous êtes capable de vous adapter facilement, vous aimez travailler en équipe.
Vous êtes rigoureux, dynamique et autonome.

Vous parlez anglais couramment.

EN - Would you like to be part of a French company known for its innovation and agility?

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!

In the heart of Paris, our teams design innovative technologies by developing man-machine interfaces under Android auto to offer the end customer an intuitive connectivity experience.

We are looking for an Electronics Design Engineer (M/F)

CONTEXT

In order to strengthen our teams, we are recruiting a hardware design engineer. Your missions will be to develop, design and qualify all or part of the electronics of an Android Infotainment system. You will work with a multi-skilled project team Mechanics, Software, Validation, Purchasing and Trade to deploy our Infotainment product range to automotive manufacturers.

MISSIONS

Your missions will be as follows:

Participate in the drafting of specifications and hardware specifications
Ensure electronic design by respecting internal procedures
Monitor subcontracting (calls for tenders, technical support, technical specifications, meeting deadlines)
Develop the product test plan in accordance with internal procedures
Qualify prototypes according to the test plan
Transmit and maintain the industrialization file (test bench specification, BOM and GERBER) to the Industrialization department via the SAP-PLM tool
Capitalizing on know-how

You will be responsible for the hardware design of all or part of a product.

You will work in close collaboration with the project team (software, mechanics, validation,...)

You will have to respect the design deadlines imposed by the project management and/or the management.

PROFILE

Technical skills :

You have an engineering degree in electronics, a recent degree or up to 5 years' experience in the automotive, aeronautics or telecommunications sectors.

You have the necessary technical skills in electronic design according to the V-cycle. You are familiar with the different switching or linear power supply structures, signal integrity and you have a good knowledge of EMC.

Ideally, you have knowledge of Orcad and SPICE and the ability to evaluate the thermal behaviour of a product / interpret the result of thermal simulation.

To know - to be:

You are able to adapt easily, you like to work in a team.
You are rigorous, dynamic and autonomous.

You speak fluent English.

description:
When you join Varian, you’re joining an organization with nearly $3 billion in annual revenue, and more than 6,500 team members across more than 30 countries. You’ll be backed by a culture that is centered on fostering your creative potential, and experience the full support of an organization and leadership committed to inspiring you to do your best work. Bring your talent to a place where your work will help fight cancer. Join Varian’s Oncology Systems team, and the work you do can make a difference by helping to create a world without fear of cancer. We develop and manufacture products and solutions that innovate, support and streamline cancer-fighting solutions worldwide. Our teams have a common drive to help others, and a passion for excellence. Join Varian and add your talent to the fight against cancer.
Job Description
Le rôle

Au sein d’une équipe d’ingénieurs vous répondrez aux demandes des clients par email, téléphone ou accès à distance afin de fournir le support nécessaire et résoudre les problèmes.
Vous rapporterez directement au manager service software qui est basé en France.
Vous serez idéalement basé en Belgique (Diegem) ou en France (Le Plessis Robinson) ou éventuellement en télétravail.

Vous voyagerez sur le terrain environs 20% à 30% de votre temps.

Vos responsabilités
Votre plus grand challenge sera de résoudre les soucis de fonctionnement de logiciels dans différents environnements.
A chaque nouvelle intervention vous mettez à jour notre système de CRM avec le descriptif des taches et solutions apportées.
Vous envoyez un rapport détaillé aux clients décrivant l’intervention ainsi que la description des solutions.
Vous assistez nos clients, soit à distance ou sur site pour les mises à jour ou maintenances préventives.
Vous participez régulièrement au support à distance (helpdesk) pour la Belgique et la France.
Vous assistez nos distributeurs situés en Afrique et aux DOM/TOM.
Job Requirements
Grace à vos qualités d’analyse et diagnostique vous mettez en place des solutions, et cela avec un excellent sens de l’urgence et de réactivité.
Une excellente expérience au niveau troubleshooting sur les Serveurs Windows.
MSSQL Administration ou expérience avec un système de base de données similaire.
Bonne connaissance des réseaux informatiques.
Connaissances de Citrix et Active Directory.
Vous parlez Français parfaitement et avez une très bonne maitrise de l’anglais.
Vous avez une bonne expérience au sein d’un support helpdesk.
Un background Administration systèmes ou ingénieur service IT.
Une expérience dans le secteur de la Radiothérapie est un plus!
Become part of our team
At Varian, our culture is centered on fostering the creative potential of every employee through teamwork and collaboration. Our technologies touch millions of lives every day, and this inspires us to do our best work – every day. By using your talent, ambition and creativity, you can build a career that allows you to make a real difference in people’s lives. You’re just one click away from the most impactful work you’ll ever do. Apply now and join our mission to help save lives. Someone, somewhere, will be glad you did.

CONTEXTE

Dans le cadre du développement et de la conception de plateforme multimédia pour l'automobile, vous intégrerez une équipe dont le but est de développer les spécificités produits sur une plateforme OEM générique sous Android pour de multiples constructeurs automobiles.

date_publication:

description:
DESCRIPTION
Work is about doing something that matters and growing as we do it. That's why we've built HR software that can help make this happen. At Talentsoft our mission is to help everyone, from our people to our customers, experience work differently.

Each of our 600 Talentsoftees comes to work with an entrepreneurial spirit and the flexibility to try new things, work with innovative technologies, and build corporate-social responsibility directly into their jobs. The result is that we have 9 million people in 130 countries using our products, strong brand recognition in a fiercely competitive industry, and employees who work differently and love their jobs because of it.

If you'd love to love your job check out the description below, apply today, and discover how you can work differently too.
JOB
Talentsoft développe une solution web de gestion des Talents : notre outil est une suite de modules en mode SaaS qui assiste les équipes Ressources Humaines dans la gestion du recrutement, de la formation et de la gestion des carrières. Notre solution permet à 10 millions d’utilisateurs d’avoir un impact sur leur trajectoire professionnelle : avec Talentsoft, demander une mobilité, candidater sur un poste ouvert, se former en ligne ou bien piloter les rémunérations de son équipe se fait en quelques clics.

Pour concevoir, développer et faire évoluer cette solution, 200 ingénieurs travaillent chez Talentsoft ; chaque jour, ils améliorent les modules existants, et enrichissent la solution en développant les fonctionnalités qui permettront aux clients de mieux gérer leurs processus RH.

Les équipes techniques sont principalement composées de Développeurs qui développent en C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET. Certains sont passionnés par l’algorithmie, d’autres se forment petit à petit aux technologies Frontend. Actuellement, nous remplaçons des pans entiers de l’application par des composants ReactJS (démarche DesignSystem). On utilise SQL Server pour les bases de données, et la solution est hébergée sur Azure. Les squads fonctionnent toutes en Agile (SCRUM ou Kanban), et on essaye tous d’appliquer les principes DevOps pour délivrer en continu.

Une journée-type dans la vie d’un Développeur chez Talentsoft :

De bon matin, tu participes au Stand Up Meeting,
Avec ta squad, vous vous fixez des objectifs réalistes pour la journée,
Au cours de la journée, tu passes du temps sur ton clavier : tu développes de nouvelles features, tu améliore une fonctionnalité existante ou bien tu refactores du code. Tu travailles en solo, ou bien avec ton « Peer »,
Quand tu n’es pas sur ton clavier, alors tu échanges avec les membres de ta squad : un Product Owner, mais aussi un UX Designer, un Architecte et un Quality Engineer. Ensemble vous trouvez de nouvelles façons d’avancer dans la même direction,
Jour après jour, tu échanges avec les membres de ta guilde, qui travaillent sur d’autres parties de l’application, dans d’autres squads. Ainsi, tu apprends de nouvelles choses, chaque jour.
Tu profites de ton « free time » (20% de ton temps) pour te former sur de nouvelles technos, ou bien développer des side-projects.
PROFILE

Quelques exemples de projets en cours :
Nous remplaçons une partie de notre applicatif par des composants ReactJS, et nous modernisons la stack en remplaçant les Webforms par des technologies plus modernes,
Nous enrichissons notre SDK afin que des éditeurs tiers puissent créer des widgets directement à l’intérieur de notre applicatif, et nous créons une plateforme PaaS,
Nous développons notre nouveau CoreHR, le cœur de l’application regroupant toutes les données administratives des collaborateurs,
Nous développons un module d’évaluation en continue des collaborateurs qui ressemble beaucoup à un board TrelloNous développons notre première appli mobile (Android et iOS) pour rendre les Systèmes d’Information RH plus accessibles à tous les utilisateurs,
En somme, chez Talentsoft, nous enrichissons chaque jour notre produit, et nous travaillons régulièrement sur de nouveaux projets qui viennent enrichir l’applicatif existant – le tout, dans une démarche DevOps / CI, en automatisant le plus possible les tests et les phases de release.

Ce qu’il te faut pour réussir dans ce poste :
Si tu maitrises le C# .NET et que tu viens du monde du développement web, tout sera plus simple pour toi,
Chez Talentsoft, nous sommes d’éternels apprenants : on aime tester, construire, déconstruire, échouer, apprendre, recommencer, réussir. Chez Talentsoft, on aime expérimenter. C’est ta curiosité et ta soif d’apprendre qui te permettront de te sentir bien dans ton poste, et de te trouver de nouvelles limites,
Très sincèrement, c’est tout ce qu’il te faut.

Quelques infos en plus :
Tu auras un ordinateur puissant, et 2 à 3 écrans (24 pouces),
Tu travailles dans un open space calme et propice à la concentration, entouré(e) de ta squad,
Tu bénéficies de 20% de freetime pour explorer de nouveaux projets,
Tu iras dans des confs : Devoxx, Meilleur Dev de France, Dev Fest, Api Days…
Tous les vendredis, on organise un meetup interne avec des pizza pour présenter un sujet tech (nouvelle techno, nouvel outil…),
On est favorables au télétravail (1 jour par semaine),
Dans nos locaux tu trouveras : oranges pressées, thé et café, barbecue sur le rooftop, ping-pong, babyfoot, balançoires, console de jeux vidéo, cours de yoga,
On a une bonne mutuelle et un bon CE, on rembourse 50% du pass navigo, 50% des tickets resto,
Nos locaux sont à 30 mètres du métro (arrêt Billancourt, ligne 9)

Si tu veux un aperçu des projets techniques que l’on met en œuvre chez Talentsoft, tu peux lire le blog des Développeurs(https://techlife.talentsoft.com). Si tu veux rencontrer nos équipes et travailler avec nous, envoie-nous ton CV !

PERKS
Freshly squeezed OJ Foosball Ping-pong table Rooftop terrace Electric bikes Lounge

description:
Mission
AXA Global Parametrics is looking for an Engineering Manager who will lead the IT development team to achieve business requirements for the next couple of years. Those business requirements include index-based insurance products standardization as well as building the new vision of AXA Global Parametrics in terms of loss-based insurance, including image-based loss assessment and new services.

Main roles and responsibilities
In collaboration with the rest of the team, and particularly the product owners and the head of tech & data, the engineering manager will:

1. Contribute actively to the definition of AGP “Tech & Data” Strategy
Participate to business products discussion and bring vision
Choice of technological stacks (mainly cloud but not only)
Make or Buy choices
Global Architecture design
Product development roadmap prioritization (with the product owners)

2. Lead the development team in order to deliver high quality products
Bring vision, unite the team around common objectives, cultivate the spirit initiative
Ensure development team is part of the global AGP team (not aside)
Participate to recruitment phases (whether internal or external workforce)
Agile working methodology (frameworks, sprints, rituals, roles, …)
Effective and efficient setup of engineering practices (clean code, pair coding, code reviews, test first, continuous integration and continuous delivery, tres amigos, …)
Team management, prioritization and staffing
Ensure products compliance with group security and regulatory guidelines

3. Ensure BAU & maintenance while products are live
Platform upgrades
Components monitoring
Corrective and evolutionary maintenance
Prioritization between BAU and project
In terms of components, the engineering manager will have to cover all the value chain, for both index-based and loss-based parametric insurance covers:
Data sourcing
Data storage, preparation and lineage
Data transformation pipelines and pricing tools (mainly R, Python)
Back-end (SQL and NoSQL databases, application exposure through data service layers toward external and internal world)
Front-ends (for AGP team, brokers, customers, …)
Other Internal IT solutions (customers, contracts, claims, policy management, …)

Qualifications
Education:
Computer Science (engineering school, master, PhD) with good programming skills and good understanding of data science

Language:
Conversational level in English required
Fluency in French desired

Required skills:
Strong experience as an IT consultant, software engineer, tech lead or architect
Good knowledge of main cloud providers
Already worked on data and computer vision projects
Good knowledge of main data, back, and front-end frameworks : JS, Java/C#, NodeJs, Python R, Tensorflow, PyTorch, SQL and NoSQL DB, numpy, scikit-learn, gensim, nltk, …
Strong autonomy and ability to work in a fast-changing world
Rigorous in the delivery
Team spirit
About AXA
Would you like to wake up every day driven and inspired by our noble mission and to work together as one global team to empower people to live a better life? Here at AXA we strive to lead the transformation of our industry. We are looking for talented individuals who come from varied backgrounds, think differently and want to be part of this exciting transformation by challenging the status quo so we can push AXA - a leading global brand and one of the most innovative companies in our industry - onto even greater things.
In a fast-evolving world and with a presence in 64 countries, our 165,000 employees and exclusive distributors anticipate change to offer services and solutions tailored to the current and future needs of our 107 million customers
AXA, as one of the world leaders in financial protection, supports and advises its customers in three major business lines: Property & Casualty Insurance, Life & Savings, and Asset Management. Since 2014, AXA’s parametric insurance team has developed market-leading products to insure against climate risks. Clients range from individuals and corporations to governments and public institutions; they come from various weather-sensitive sectors across the world including agriculture, renewable energy, construction, transportation, leisure, and textiles.

Data scientists, meteorologists, business developers, underwriters and IT make up the parametric insurance team. Working closely together, they create innovative insurance products that meet clients’ needs.

What We Offer
If you want to join a dynamic and challenging environment, do not hesitate to apply !

Nous recherchons un Ingénieur logiciel embarqué (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Nous recherchons un(e) Ingénieur(e) en développement logiciel embarqué (H/F) pour rejoindre l'équipe Digital Tuner qui est en charge du développement des solutions de réception de télévision numérique et de radio de Parrot Faurecia Automotive.

MISSIONS

Vos missions seront de :
Développer et maintenir le logiciel embarqué de décodage canal pour les différentes normes de réception de radio et de télévision numérique de Parrot Faurecia Automotive
Assurer le support auprès de l'équipe driver pour l'implémentation de ces normes

Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme d'Ingénieur ou d'un Master à dominante logicielle et justifiez d'une expérience professionnelle d'au moins 2 ans.

Vous maîtrisez le langage C, avez une bonne expérience en développement sur systèmes embarqués et connaissez les normes de réception radio et/ou TV.

Vous faites preuve de rigueur, d'autonomie et d'esprit d'analyse.
Vous communiquez facilement et aimez le travail en équipe.

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

Take up with us one of the greatest challenges in the automotive industry!

CONTEXT

We are looking for an Embedded Software Development Engineer (M/F) to join the Digital Tuner team, which is in charge of the development of Parrot Faurecia Automotive's digital television and radio reception solutions.

MISSIONS

Your missions will be:
Develop and maintain the on-board decoding software for Parrot Faurecia Automotive's various radio and digital television reception standards
Provide support to the driver team for the implementation of these standards
Participate in the development of functional test scenarios related to the validation team

You will have responsibilities:
Compliance with transmission standards by the Parrot Faurecia Automotive receiver
Reporting to the manager and developers of the Digital Tuner team

PROFILE

You have a degree in Engineering or a Master in software and justify a professional experience of at least 2 years.

You are fluent in C language, have a good experience in development on embedded systems and know the standards of radio reception and / or TV.

You demonstrate rigor, autonomy and analytical skills.
You communicate easily and enjoy teamwork.
You speak English fluently.

les différentes équipes internes développant les autres fonctionnalités
le service validation
les fournisseurs

Evaluer les nouvelles fonctionnalités et technologies (ASR/TTS)

Garantir le bon fonctionnement de la librairie logicielle en charge de la reconnaissance/synthèse vocale pour l'ensemble des projets

Apporter du support sur la thématique « Reco Vocale » : conseils, méthodes, outils

Vous possédez aussi des connaissances ou des expériences en développement Java.
Vous avez des capacités à traiter des données structurées ou non structurées, de types variés (SQL, HTML, XML).
Une connaissance des outils GIT, Atlassian (JIRA, Confluence), dans les domaines du Traitement de la parole, d'Android, et des outils Nuance seraient également appréciées.
Vous montrez un fort intérêt et une bonne connaissance de l'écosystème Android.

Vous faites preuve de rigueur, d'une grande curiosité et d'une forte capacité d'initiative.
Vous êtes soucieux(se) du détail, et avez d'excellentes compétences analytiques.
Vous parlez couramment l'anglais.

Des déplacements à l'étranger sont à prévoir.

EN - Would you like to be part of a French company known for its innovation and agility?

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

In the heart of Paris, our teams design innovative technologies by developing man-machine interfaces under Android auto to offer the end customer an intuitive connectivity experience.
Our embedded electronics solutions are equipped with powerful multi-core graphics processors to respond more quickly to various simultaneous instructions.

Take up with us one of the greatest challenges in the automotive industry!

We are looking for a C/C++ Software development Engineer - Vocal Recognition (M/F)

CONTEXT

You will have to specify, develop, integrate and test the new voice recognition functionalities and ensure that they work properly (technical maintenance and tests).
In charge of developing and maintaining the software library that drives the speech recognition and speech synthesis engines, you will have to be rigorous and responsive.
You will also have to meet methodological requirements by being able to specify the supported functions and to provide technical support and advice.

MISSIONS

You will be part of a diversified team (navigation, translations, voice reception) in which different subjects of expertise and innovation are evaluated, integrated and optimized.

Reporting to the manager of the transversal activities of the Auto (voice recognition, navigation, translations), you will have to perform the following tasks:
Specify new developments in response to internal/external customer requests
Develop the software library communicating with text-to-speech and speech recognition engines
Integrate/Test new developments and define associated tests
Manage the resolution of problems interfacing with, in particular:
the various internal teams developing the other functionalities
the validation service
the suppliers
Provide technical support on the use of voice recognition
Evaluate new features and technologies (ASR/TTS)

You will have to be responsive and involved in a constantly evolving field. You will need to stay informed about new technologies related to the Android world and the various innovations related to speech recognition.

As such, you will be responsible for:
Ensure the proper functioning of the software library in charge of speech recognition/synthesis for all projects
Participate in the development and implementation of the new speech recognition platform
Provide support on the theme "Reco Vocale": advice, methods, tools

PROFILE

You have an engineering degree, a master's degree, or a PhD (ideally speech processing) (BAC+5) and have 2 to 5 years' experience in the voice recognition or automotive sectors.

You have strong computer development skills (C, C++, Python,...) and a good understanding of speech recognition technologies.
You are familiar with embedded C and GNU tools.
You also have knowledge or experience in Java development.
You have the ability to process structured or unstructured data of various types (SQL, HTML, XML).
Knowledge of GIT, Atlassian (JIRA, Confluence), speech processing, Android, and Nuance tools would also be appreciated.
You show a strong interest and knowledge of the Android ecosystem.

You are rigorous, curious and have a strong capacity for initiative.
You are detail-oriented and have excellent analytical skills.
You are fluent in English.

Travel abroad is to be expected.

Nos solutions électroniques embarquées sont dotées de processeurs graphiques multi-cœur puissants afin de répondre plus rapidement à diverses instructions simultanées.

Relevez avec nous l'un des plus grands challenges de l'industrie automobile !

Nous recherchons un Ingénieur intégration logicielle (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Au sein de l'équipe projet et en collaboration avec le responsable intégration, vous serez en charge de l'intégration logicielle.
Le poste couvre l'intégration d'une plateforme Android (Java, C/C++) et de composants logiciels en C/C++.
En mode Agile, vous serez en relation quotidienne avec les équipes responsables de ces composants afin de suivre les développements et anticiper les changements.

MISSIONS

Vous serez responsable du suivi et de l'intégration des évolutions des différents composants logiciels dans le contexte du développement d'un programme client :
Plateforme Android
Equipe OS
Bus vehicule (gateway CAN, LIN, ethernet)
Tuner
Développements de l'équipe client (applications Android, VHAL, cluster)

Vous serez en charge des tests d'intégration via l'automatisation de tests et de la génération des versions logicielles et des rapports associés.

Vos missions seront les suivantes :
Intégrer et configurer des composants logiciels issus des équipes plateformes
Suivre le développement plateforme et anticiper l'intégration (e.g., nightly build, tests en amont, …)
Préparer les changements au niveau projet, nécessaires pour l'intégration
Spécifier et développer des tests d'intégration
Automatiser l'exécution des tests
Générer des versions logicielles incluant les rapports de tests

PROFIL

Vous êtes diplômé d'une école d'ingénieur ou d'un cycle universitaire et disposez de 2 ans d'expérience minimum en intégration logicielle.

Vous avez les compétences techniques suivantes :
GIT et GERRIT,
repo,
Java,
C/C++,
Linux,
Scripting (python, bash),
Jenkins,
Docker

Dans l'idéal vous avez des connaissances en ASpice, Groovy.

Vous êtes autonome, rigoureux et êtes à l'aise avec le reporting.

Vous avez un bon niveau d'anglais, notamment technique.

EN - Would you like to be part of a French company known for its innovation and agility?

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

We are looking for a Software Integration Engineer (M/F)

CONTEXT

Within the project team and in collaboration with the integration manager, you will be in charge of software integration.
The position covers the integration of an Android platform (Java, C/C++) and software components in C/C++.
In Agile mode, you will be in daily contact with the teams responsible for these components in order to monitor developments and anticipate changes.

MISSIONS

You will be responsible for monitoring and integrating the evolutions of the various software components in the context of the development of a customer program:

Android platform
OS Team
Vehicle bus (CAN, LIN, Ethernet gateway)
Tuner
Developments of the customer team (Android, VHAL, cluster applications)

You will be in charge of integration testing through test automation and the generation of software versions and associated reports.

Your missions will be as follows:

Integrate and configure software components from platform teams
Monitor platform development and anticipate integration (e.g., nightly build, upstream tests, etc.)
Prepare the changes at the project level necessary for integration
Specify and develop integration tests
Automate test execution
Generate software versions including test reports

PROFILE

You are a graduate of an engineering school or university and have a minimum of 2 years of experience in software integration.

You have the following technical skills:
GIT and GERRIT,
repo,
Java,
C/C+++,
Linux,
Scripting (python, bash),
Jenkins,
Docker

Ideally you have knowledge of ASpice, Groovy.

You are autonomous, rigorous and comfortable with reporting.

You have a good level of English, especially technical English.

description:

Rejoignez Faurecia Clarion Electronics, alliant un esprit start-up à un équipementier automobile de 1er rang, pour développer le cockpit du futur !

L’activité automobile de Parrot a été racheté à 100% par Faurecia en 2018 et a donné naissance à Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe : 4ème Business Group de Faurecia.

Au cœur de Paris, nos équipes conçoivent des technologies innovantes en développant des interfaces homme-machine sous Android auto pour offrir au client final une expérience connectique intuitive.
Nos solutions électroniques embarquées sont dotées de processeurs graphiques multi-cœur puissants afin de répondre plus rapidement à diverses instructions simultanées.

Relevez avec nous l'un des plus grands challenges de l'industrie automobile !

Nous recherchons un Ingénieur Safety (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Vous intégrerez une équipe projet qui a pour objectif de développer un système embarqué de type Infotainment, pour un client constructeur automobile international.

MISSIONS

Vous contriburez à l'élaboration des exigences safety et à leur allocation (incluant leur traçabilité) et participerez à la définition de l'architecture system et formaliser les safety concept.

Vous réaliserez les analyses safety system (FMEA, FTA, analyses d'impact, calcul de Fiabilité) et participerez au développement de façon proactive en accompagnant les différents métiers (électronique, logiciel, système, qualité…) pour la mise en place des activités Safety conformément à la norme ISO26262 et au processus de développement produit.

Vous participerez à l'élaboration des documents Safety de conception au niveau Système et composants (Functional Safety Concept, Technical Safety Concept) et gérerez les aspects Safety avec les clients externes.

Vous coordonnerez la réalisation des documentations conformément à la norme ISO26262, ainsi que les revues Safety, validation des exigences fonctionnelles et audits.Vous participerez à l'amélioration des référentiels et processus de développement conformément à la norme ISO26262.

PROFIL

Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme d'Ingénieur ou d'une formation universitaire équivalente (BAC+5) et justifiez d'une expérience de 3 ans dans le domaine de la Sureté de fonctionnement SDF idéalement dans le secteur de l'industrie automobile.

Vous avez une très bonne connaissance de la Méthode Sureté de fonctionnement SDF selon la norme ISO26262 : arbres de défaillances, analyses de risque, AMDEC.

Vous êtes force de proposition, autonome et faites preuve de rigueur. Vous appréciez le travail en équipe et vous avez un bon relationnel et une capacité d'analyse et de synthèse éprouvées.

Un anglais courant pour ce poste est nécessaire.

EN - Would you like to be part of a French company known for its innovation and agility?

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

In the heart of Paris, our teams design innovative technologies by developing man-machine interfaces under Android auto to offer the end customer an intuitive connectivity experience.
Our embedded electronics solutions are equipped with powerful multi-core graphics processors to respond more quickly to various simultaneous instructions.

Take up with us one of the greatest challenges in the automotive industry!

We are looking for a Safety Engineer (M/F)

CONTEXT

You will join a project team whose objective is to develop an embedded Infotainment system for an international automotive manufacturer customer.

MISSIONS

You will contribute to the development of safety requirements and their allocation (including their traceability) and will participate in the definition of the architecture system and formalize the safety concept.

You will carry out safety system analyses (FMEA, FTA, impact analyses, reliability calculation) and participate in the development in a proactive way by supporting the various business lines (electronics, software, system, quality...) for the implementation of Safety activities in accordance with the ISO26262 standard and the product development process.

You will develop design Safety documents at System and component level (Functional Safety Concept, Technical Safety Concept) and manage Safety aspects with external customers.

You will coordinate the production of documentation in accordance with ISO2626262, as well as Safety reviews, validation of functional requirements and audits, and participate in the improvement of standards and development processes in accordance with ISO26262.

PROFILE

You have an engineering degree or equivalent university education (BAC+5) and 5 years' experience in the field of SDF operational safety, ideally in the automotive industry.

You have a very good knowledge of the SDF Operating Safety Method according to ISO26262, the practice of Operating Safety tools such as fault trees, risk analyses, FMECA and technical skills in electronic development (System, hardware and software).

Knowledge in Development Quality Method (APQP, Quality chain and cascade of critical characteristics, traceability,...), practice of Design for 6 Sigma tools, Design to Quality for robustness in design, technical skills in mechanical development would be desirable.

You are a force of proposal, autonomous and rigorous. You appreciate teamwork and have a good interpersonal skills and a proven ability to analyse and synthesise.

A fluent English for this position is required.

description:
Mission
Sous la responsabilité de votre maître de stage ou de votre tuteur, vous participerez aux missions suivantes :

Livrer régulièrement des solutions informatiques ayant de la valeur métier, par la pratique du TDD et du BDD,
Prévenir la dette technique par la pratique du Refactoring,
Travailler en équipe (pair programming, développement agile, Devops),
Rechercher la technologie la plus adaptée pour garantir la sécurité, la scalabilité des solutions et l'expérience utilisateur la plus optimale,
Analyser les erreurs et contribuer à l’amélioration continue des solutions,
Partager vos connaissances avec les autres Software Craftsmen,
Partager du code avec d'autres équipes sur notre Github Enterprise.

Prenez votre place dans LA banque relationnelle, engagée pour ses clients et ses collaborateurs !
Tous nos postes sont ouverts aux personnes en situation de handicap.
Profil
Vous souhaitez effectuer un stage au sein de la Société Générale et vous êtes un étudiant de niveau Bac+4/5 en Université, Ecole d’ingénieur.

Coder est pour vous une passion, et pas seulement une compétence. Vous vous développez régulièrement sur les derniers langages et technologies.
Vous êtes déjà spécialisé(e) dans :
un ou plusieurs langages : C++, Node JS, SQL
et/ou technologies web: Angularjs
et d’outils de développement: Git, Github Enterprise, Visual Studio 2013, XL Deploy
Votre anglais courant vous permettra de travailler dans un environnement international.
Et si c'était vous ?
Postulez dès maintenant !
Si votre candidature est sélectionnée, vous serez directement contacté par un opérationnel pour un entretien de motivation.
Durée du stage : 6 mois
Stage basé à : Colombes
Gratification selon grilles SG.
Evolution
3600 ITECiens répartis aux quatre coins du monde, en Asie, Amérique et Europe dont les challenges sont :
de co-construire la transformation de nos métiers,
de livrer régulièrement et rapidement les solutions qui repoussent sans cesse les limites de la technologie… … dans un environnement où le travail en équipe est notre quotidien et où le partage fait partie de notre culture
Le futur de la finance sera hi-tech , créons le ensemble au sein d’ITEC en s’appuyant sur nos trois piliers : l'excellence technique, la co-création de valeur et l'esprit d’équipe.
Environnement
ITEC est la Direction Informatique de la Banque de Grande Clientèle et Solutions Investisseurs. Notre mission est de co-construire avec nos partenaires métiers des solutions technologiques nous permettant d'avoir les meilleurs services pour nos clients. Notre ambition est de transformer la finance de marché. Nos artisans développeurs doivent faire preuve d’enthousiasme et relever des challenges technologiques pour réussir la transformation digitale de la Banque.

ITEC/SGS pilote la stratégie des SI de SGSS en étroite collaboration avec la stratégie IT du Groupe SG, anime la filière informatique et gère l'ensemble des prestations IT délivrées à SGSS.

CONTEXTE

Dans l'objectif de renforcer nos équipes, nous recrutons un ingénieur de conception Hardware. Vos missions seront : développer, concevoir et qualifier tout ou partie de l'électronique d'un système d'Infotainment Android. Vous travaillerez avec une équipe projet multi-compétences Mécanique, Logiciel, Validation, Achat et Commerce au déploiement de notre gamme de produit d'Infotainment chez les constructeurs automobiles.

MISSIONS

Vos missions seront les suivantes :
Participer à la rédaction du cahier des charges et des spécifications Hardware
Assurer la conception électronique en respectant les procédures internes
Suivre la sous-traitance (appels d'offre, support technique, spécifications techniques, respect des délais)
Elaborer le plan de test du produit en respectant les procédures internes
Qualifier les prototypes selon le plan de test
Transmettre et maintenir le dossier d'industrialisation (spécification du banc de test, BOM et GERBER) au service Industrialisation via l'outil SAP-PLM
Capitaliser le savoir-faire

Vous serez responsable de la conception hardware de tout ou partie d'un produit.
Vous travaillerez en étroite collaboration avec l'équipe projet (logiciel, mécanique, validation, …)
Vous devrez respecter les délais de conception imposés par la gestion projet et/ou la direction.

PROFIL

Compétences techniques :

Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme d'ingénieur à dominante électronique, jeune diplômé ou jusqu'à à 5 ans d'expérience au sein du secteur automobile, aéronautique ou des télécommunications.

Vous disposez des compétences techniques indispensables en conception électronique selon le cycle en V. Vous maîtrisez les différentes structures d'alimentation à découpage ou linéaire, l'intégrité des signaux et vous avez de bonnes notions de CEM.

Dans l'idéal, vous avez des connaissances en Orcad et SPICE et la capacité à évaluer le comportement thermique d'un produit / interpréter le résultat de simulation thermique.

Savoir -être :

Vous êtes capable de vous adapter facilement, vous aimez travailler en équipe.
Vous êtes rigoureux, dynamique et autonome.

We are looking for an Electronics Design Engineer (M/F)

CONTEXT

In order to strengthen our teams, we are recruiting a hardware design engineer. Your missions will be to develop, design and qualify all or part of the electronics of an Android Infotainment system. You will work with a multi-skilled project team Mechanics, Software, Validation, Purchasing and Trade to deploy our Infotainment product range to automotive manufacturers.

MISSIONS

Your missions will be as follows:

Participate in the drafting of specifications and hardware specifications
Ensure electronic design by respecting internal procedures
Monitor subcontracting (calls for tenders, technical support, technical specifications, meeting deadlines)
Develop the product test plan in accordance with internal procedures
Qualify prototypes according to the test plan
Transmit and maintain the industrialization file (test bench specification, BOM and GERBER) to the Industrialization department via the SAP-PLM tool
Capitalizing on know-how

You will be responsible for the hardware design of all or part of a product.

You will work in close collaboration with the project team (software, mechanics, validation,...)

You will have to respect the design deadlines imposed by the project management and/or the management.

PROFILE

Technical skills :

You have an engineering degree in electronics, a recent degree or up to 5 years' experience in the automotive, aeronautics or telecommunications sectors.

You have the necessary technical skills in electronic design according to the V-cycle. You are familiar with the different switching or linear power supply structures, signal integrity and you have a good knowledge of EMC.

Ideally, you have knowledge of Orcad and SPICE and the ability to evaluate the thermal behaviour of a product / interpret the result of thermal simulation.

To know - to be:

You are able to adapt easily, you like to work in a team.
You are rigorous, dynamic and autonomous.

You speak fluent English.

Rejoignez Faurecia Clarion Electronics, alliant un esprit start-up à un équipementier automobile de 1er rang, pour développer le cockpit du futur !

L’activité automobile de Parrot a été racheté à 100% par Faurecia en 2018 et a donné naissance à Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe : 4ème Business Group de Faurecia.

Au cœur de Paris, nos équipes conçoivent des technologies innovantes en développant des interfaces homme-machine sous Android auto pour offrir au client final une expérience connectique intuitive.
Nos solutions électroniques embarquées sont dotées de processeurs graphiques multi-cœur puissants afin de répondre plus rapidement à diverses instructions simultanées.

Relevez avec nous l'un des plus grands challenges de l'industrie automobile !

Nous recherchons un Ingénieur en développement système embarqué – Java pour Android (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Dans le cadre du développement et de la conception de plateforme multimédia pour l'automobile, vous intégrerez une équipe dont le but est de développer les spécificités produits sur une plateforme OEM générique sous Android pour de multiples constructeurs automobiles.

MISSIONS

Vous serez en charge de spécifier, développer, intégrer et tester de nouvelles fonctionnalités répondant aux demandes clients Internes/Externes (IHM, fonctionnalité multimédia, …).

Vous gérerez la résolution des problèmes en interface avec les différentes équipes internes développant les autres fonctionnalités génériques, les clients internes/externes (conférence téléphonique, workshop), et le service validation.

Vous travaillerez à l'amélioration de la qualité logicielle en intégrant les processus définis et participerez à des workshops techniques chez les clients.

PROFIL

Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme d'ingénieur à dominante logiciel.

Vous maîtrisez Java, Linux, Scripting, Android HMI, Android Framework.

Idéalement, vous possédez des compétences en ce qui concerne les outils de gestion de configuration GIT et GERRIT.

Votre anglais est opérationnel d'un point de vue technique.

Vous êtes passionné(e), motivé(e) et vous appréciez les projets innovants ! Votre force de proposition et votre sens du relationnel seront de véritables atouts !

EN - Would you like to be part of a French company known for its innovation and agility?

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

In the heart of Paris, our teams design innovative technologies by developing man-machine interfaces under Android auto to offer the end customer an intuitive connectivity experience.
Our embedded electronics solutions are equipped with powerful multi-core graphics processors to respond more quickly to various simultaneous instructions.

Take up with us one of the greatest challenges in the automotive industry!

We are looking for a Embedded Software Engineer - Java for Android (M/W)

CONTEXT

As part of the development and design of multimedia platforms for the automotive industry, you will join a team whose goal is to develop product specificities on a generic OEM platform under Android for multiple car manufacturers

MISSIONS

You will be in charge of specifying, developing, integrating and testing new functionalities that meet internal/external customer requests (HMI, multimedia functionality, etc.).

You will manage the resolution of problems in interface with the various internal teams developing the other generic functionalities, internal/external customers (conference call, workshop), and the validation department.

You will work to improve software quality by integrating defined processes and participate in customer technical workshops.

PROFILE

You have an engineering degree in software engineering.

You are proficient in Java, Linux, Scripting, Android HMI, Android Framework.
Ideally, you have skills in the configuration management tools GIT and GERRIT.

You speak fluent English.

You are passionate, motivated and you appreciate innovative projects! Your ability to make proposals and your sense of relationships will be real assets!

React (hooks, HOC, renderProps) / Redux / Saga

Transition from a monolith to micro-libraries architectures and can manage more and more products
Improve the performance of the products and improve React guidelines
Build new components for our design system, and define guidelines
Continuously run tests to make sure the applications is as good as it can be
Experiment with new ideas by hacking quick prototypes
... and of course all developers are part of the product discussions. We think that it is important for people to have an impact.

Shipped and maintained code in production
Experience with React, Redux
Proficient in Javascript (ES6), HTML, CSS
Sensibility for UI and UX
Good communication skills, works well within a team
Interest in full software development lifecycle activities: requirements management, technical design, implementation, testing/release, continuous integration (TDD is a plus)
Experience with functional programming is a plus
Additional Information
Contract Type: Full-Time
Location: Paris, France (75009)
Education Level: Master's Degree
Experience: > 6 months

description:
Overview

Are you ready to progress your sales career in the fast-growing tech industry? This position is your opportunity to becoming a high-earning sales executive in a rapid-growing industry. You provide the consultative sales mentality, and we'll provide you with all the resources that you need to be successful.

What will you be doing?

As an Account Executive, your role is to identify and qualify sales leads, pitch our award-winning software solutions to medium-sized enterprises, and manage the full sales cycle.

Your responsibilities will include:
Developing new prospects and expanding existing accounts
Managing complex sales cycles with a consultative sales approach
Planning and delivering presentations that give prospective and existing customers insights into how our solutions solve their challenges
Working with dedicated pre-sales engineers and other cross-functional team members to help close business
Communicating new product developments to prospective and existing clients
Attending remote and on-site meetings with clients
Collaborating with teams in different territories and offices
Handling opportunities prospected by our Account Specialist team
Implementing and executing effective sales campaigns to ensure maximum penetration of key accounts within your territory
Maintaining an accurate and current pipeline of opportunities within the CRM system
OK, I'm interested... is this the job for me?

We look for people who value agility, passion and teamwork; those who can bring fresh ideas to the table and want the opportunity to learn, grow, and expand their careers. Bring your aptitude and build upon what you do best at for our customers, partners, team, and you.

You are tasked with bringing in new business. This means you are a creative thinker who is confident and self-motivated with an entrepreneurial mindset. You take pride in seeing your hard work pay off when you see the final results.

Other qualities you'll need to be a fit for this role include:

University degree required
2-5 years of previous sales experience
Experience in the software/technology industry is preferred but not essential
Experience with executive selling, both business and technical
Excellent communication and listening skills
Determination to surpass performance goals
Willingness to learn
Ability to work individually and within a highly collaborative team environment
Plenty of initiative
A persuasive manner
Ability to think on your feet
Fluent in French and English
About AvePoint ( https://www.avepoint.com/about/ )

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

description:
Pre-Sales Consultant
Are you:
Passionate about making a difference in the world by helping people see and understand their data?
Motivated in building successful customer relationships, by providing innovative, market-leading technology that has true business value?
Excited to join the best pre-sales teams in the business where coming to work is more than just a job?
If so, we would love to hear from you!
As part of our continued growth, we’re hiring a Pre-Sales Consultant/Sales Engineer to join our rapidly expanding and talented team.
Our Pre-Sales Consultants/Sales Engineers are the key technical point of contact for all enterprise accounts at Tableau, helping them solve complex data and analytical challenges.
The Tableau Sales team will rely on your technical and product expertise throughout the sales cycle. You’ll be an integral part of the success for both our customers and enterprise sales people by performing technical discovery qualification, making architectural recommendations for the solution, delivering product demonstrations and PoCs, and troubleshooting technical configuration issues engagements.
As a passionate technologist and customer advocate, you will connect the dots between the technical solution to business value for the customer.
Who you are…..
New to Pre-sales? These are the core skills you'll need to be successful:
Education. Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, MIS or an analytical subject, or equivalent work experience.
Experience. Hands-on technical experience in some of; Business Intelligence, ETL, Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, Databases, Data Warehousing and/or Software Architecture.
Communication. Excellent verbal communication, written communication, and presentation skills. Excellent presentation abilities and composure in front of all levels of technical and business audiences.
Flexibility. To travel as needed and to work throughout the sales territory.
Seasoned Pre-sales professional? These are the core skills you'll need to be successful:
Experienced. Demonstrable pre-sales enterprise software experience gained within the BI/Analytics/Data sector or a related technical area. Skillset to establish trust with clients, and ability to influence key decision makers in the sales cycle.
Highly Technical. Hands-on technical experience in some of; Business Intelligence, ETL, Analytics, Big Data, Data Science, Databases, Data Warehousing and/or Software Architecture. Ability to lead architectural discussions.
Domain. Experience building and delivering Proofs of Concept (PoCs) and responding to functional & technical elements of RFIs/RFPs independently and effectively
Passionate. A passion for technology and translating that passion into business impact for customers.
Communication. Excellent verbal communication, written communication, and presentation skills in front of all audiences.
Flexibility. To travel as needed and to work throughout the sales territory.
What you’ll achieve in your first year:
Complete Tableau’s world-class boot-camp program in Seattle
Your Tableau Desktop Qualified Associate qualification.
Your Tableau Server Qualified Associate qualification.
Your Tableau Certified Professional qualification.
Lead responsibility for full lifecycle pre-sales opportunity support on a set of accounts or territory.
Ownership of a key initiative area to support development for the whole team.
Attend and present best practices and thought leadership at one of our world-class marketing events
Partner with your account executives on territory, account and opportunity planning.
Influence product direction by feeding back customer requirements from the field to our product management and engineering teams
Be an integral part of our customers’ ongoing success through continual engagement in your accounts
Be a valued part of our incredible Tableau community through forums, blogs and social media.
Recruit and mentor the next generation of Tableau rock-stars

#LI-TH1
Tableau Software is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
Tableau Software is a company on a mission. We help people see and understand their data. After a highly successful IPO in 2013, Tableau has become a market-defining company in the business intelligence industry. Our culture is casual and high-energy. We are passionate about our product and our mission and we are loyal to each other and our company. We value work/life balance, efficiency, simplicity, freakishly friendly customer service, and making a difference in the world!

description:
TOTAL is looking for high performance computing (HPC) scientific software developers. The computing power of TOTAL ranks it among the world leaders.

Total is a global integrated energy producer and provider, a leading international oil and gas company, and the world’s second-ranked solar energy operator with SunPower. Our 100,000 employees around the world are committed to better energy that is safer, cleaner, more efficient, more innovative and accessible to as many people as possible. As a responsible corporate citizen, we focus on ensuring that our operations in more than 130 countries worldwide consistently deliver economic, social and environmental benefits. www.total.com.

You will work in a context with a high scientific value added, serving the core business of TOTAL and in a highly competitive field. You will be integrated into the scientific geoscience teams where you will design and develop software to deal with the fields of geophysical imaging, seismic acquisition modeling, numerical simulation of fluid flows in reservoirs, artificial intelligence applied to geosciences. The codes created are optimized to achieve the best performance needed to produce our geoscience studies, carried out by our subsidiaries and partners. You will also have to maintain the software used in production in operational conditions.

You will also be required to interact with the group's research centers, or other university partners, to help them in their achievements and to integrate the fruits of R&D work into our production codes. You will also sometimes supervise some work done by contractors.

You will need to participate in technology watch activities to maintain HPC knowledge and skills and anticipate developments in the field. You are interested in the creation, research, development, performance and optimization of codes in the HPC world, you are mobile and you enjoy working in an international context.

You are curious and open-minded. Active listening allows you to clearly identify and understand the needs of your geoscience clients. You like working in a team, while being autonomous. Your level of English allows you to collaborate with research centers abroad.
Candidate profile
Engineer, Master's Degree in High-Performance Computing & Simulation, PhD

Computer science profile, strong knowledge in numerical analysis, signal processing, mathematics, physics, fluid mechanics, finite differences, artificial intelligence, interest in geosciences

Strong skills on GPU, CUDA and OPEN ACC, Proven experience

Strong skills in optimization, profiling, debugging, performance analysis, experience of profiling tools and optimization

Programming environment FORTRAN, C, C ++, parallelization techniques MPI, OPEN MP, HMPP

JENKINS Industrial Computer Knowledge, Continuous Integration, Automatic Tests, Version Manager

Knowledge of HPC machine architectures and operating systems (Linux, HPC operation and resource management, I / O management, scheduler, parallel filesystem)

The position could be located either in Paris or Pau, regarding the applicant's wish
Offer ID
16602BR
Métier
Business Information Systems
Additional location (s)
64 - Pyrénées-Atlantiques
Workplace location (Precisions/Keywords)
PAU - The position could be located either in Paris or Pau, regarding the applicant's wish
Employment type
Regular position
Experience level required
6 - 10 years
Branch
Exploration and Production
About us / company profile
Give your best to better energy and make the commitment with Total. With over 500-plus professions in 130 countries, we offer high safety and environmental standards, strong ethical values, an innovation culture and wide-ranging career development. Be part of the global team whose mission is already shared by 100,000 employees: to make energy better each and every day.

Job Expires
10-Oct-2019

Nous recherchons un Ingénieur logiciel embarqué (H/F)

CONTEXTE

Nous recherchons un(e) Ingénieur(e) en développement logiciel embarqué (H/F) pour rejoindre l'équipe Digital Tuner qui est en charge du développement des solutions de réception de télévision numérique et de radio de Parrot Faurecia Automotive.

MISSIONS

Vos missions seront de :
Développer et maintenir le logiciel embarqué de décodage canal pour les différentes normes de réception de radio et de télévision numérique de Parrot Faurecia Automotive
Assurer le support auprès de l'équipe driver pour l'implémentation de ces normes
Participer à l'élaboration de scénarios de tests fonctionnels en relation avec l'équipe validation

Vous aurez pour responsabilités :
Le respect des normes de transmission par le récepteur Parrot Faurecia Automotive
Le reporting au responsable et aux développeurs de l'équipe Digital Tuner

PROFIL

Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme d'Ingénieur ou d'un Master à dominante logicielle et justifiez d'une expérience professionnelle d'au moins 2 ans.

Vous maîtrisez le langage C, avez une bonne expérience en développement sur systèmes embarqués et connaissez les normes de réception radio et/ou TV.

Vous faites preuve de rigueur, d'autonomie et d'esprit d'analyse.
Vous communiquez facilement et aimez le travail en équipe.
Vous parlez anglais couramment.

Join Faurecia Clarion Electronics, combining a start-up spirit with a first-class automotive equipment manufacturer, to develop the cockpit of the future!
Parrot's automotive business was acquired 100% by Faurecia in 2018 and gave rise to Faurecia Clarion Electronics Europe, Faurecia's 4th Business Group.

In the heart of Paris, our teams design innovative technologies by developing man-machine interfaces under Android auto to offer the end customer an intuitive connectivity experience.
Our embedded electronics solutions are equipped with powerful multi-core graphics processors to respond more quickly to various simultaneous instructions.

Take up with us one of the greatest challenges in the automotive industry!

We are looking for an Embedded software engineer (M/F)

CONTEXT

We are looking for an Embedded Software Development Engineer (M/F) to join the Digital Tuner team, which is in charge of the development of Parrot Faurecia Automotive's digital television and radio reception solutions.

MISSIONS

Your missions will be:
Develop and maintain the on-board decoding software for Parrot Faurecia Automotive's various radio and digital television reception standards
Provide support to the driver team for the implementation of these standards
Participate in the development of functional test scenarios related to the validation team

You will have responsibilities:
Compliance with transmission standards by the Parrot Faurecia Automotive receiver
Reporting to the manager and developers of the Digital Tuner team

PROFILE

You have a degree in Engineering or a Master in software and justify a professional experience of at least 2 years.

You are fluent in C language, have a good experience in development on embedded systems and know the standards of radio reception and / or TV.

You demonstrate rigor, autonomy and analytical skills.
You communicate easily and enjoy teamwork.
You speak English fluently.

description:
Vous souhaitez intégrer une entreprise française, innovante et agile ?

Rejoignez Faurecia Clarion Electronics, alliant un esprit start-up à un équipementier automobile de 1er rang, pour développer le cockpit du futur !
